reviews[0].review: I have tried other instant coffees, they have all been disappointing.  Taster's Choice I like.  When they say instant, they mean it.  All the crystals dissolve right away.  Nowadays I find I don't want to do a whole setup, when all I need is some boiling water.  There aren't that many decaffeinated instant coffees.  Health wise, the caffeine every day was not helping me, I knew I had to give it up.  I had grown dependent on it.  It also didn't help that I had high blood pressure, and I was pissed off all the time!

reviews[0].review: So for what you get product wise the amount for the money is good. The on the go convenience is good as well. BUT as my wife has stated and coworkers, the powder as you pour it and as you make it, gives off a smell very, very similar to tuna fish?! It's strong enough to get noticed and have people ask did you make a tuna fish sandwich? Once you have mixed it with hot water or hot milk the smell goes away and you can't smell it when you bring it up to your nose to drink. But it is very prominent prior to, especially if you're water is steaming. As for taste it's ok not too sweet. But for my palette I prefer more coffee and a bit more caramel. This has a watered down flavor. So will I buy it again... No. But what I have left will be good for traveling in a pinch.

This origins one is very distinct in its flavor the bitter sour flavor hits like a ton of bricks maybe that's what Columbia coffee is suppose to be but I didn't enjoy this one. I've still got a "Uganda-Kenya" and "Alta-Rica" to try hopefully I like those more. *Update- After reading Colombian coffee especially handpicked perfect beans will produce high acidity coffee and that is what this has to be. Some may like that I personally found it an unpleasant taste. This is what you get when you do origin coffee and think this would most likely be blended with a low acid coffee.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

Everything from flavor down to caffeine kick is even more mild than it's Original partner, if you like mild sweet coffee, this is great but unfortunately it was a little too sweet and too little in everything else. Meh for the hazelnut. ORIGINAL WHITE COFFEE: I had recently finished another brand (Ah Huat) of Malaysia instant white coffee that my aunt had given from her trip to Malaysia so my intention for this purchase was with a given taste profile in mind. Compare to what I was looking for... this came a little short: the flavor isn't as strong/bold and the caffeine level is not even close (on some days that one gave me the jitters). Overall, however, if you're looking for a quick, decent, good tasting cup of instant white coffee, this will do the trick.\nJust pour hot water. Makes it super easy for a lazy morning/afternoon cup of joe or great for traveling because they're individually wrapped/portioned to about 8-12oz (depending on how much water you add but it has enough flavor to uphold the water additions)","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Rajkumar Khelemba Singh", "review":"I order this white coffee 3 in 1 like yestersday (Oct 31, 2017) and I just received it (Nov 1, 2017) today. The coffee taste is great and creamy too. I have done my research on "white coffee" and why they're called like that, but it turns out they called it "white coffee" because they light roasted the coffee bean (also added condensed milk). Of course, there are more details on why they're called like that, but this is just my information that I found. Other than that, this 3 in 1 coffee is great and I'll recommend anyone that likes their coffee creamy.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews[0].review: Product has Serbian texts on the back which are based on Cyrillic just as Russian text and thus some are guessing that this might be from Russia. Not quite. Product also has text from almost all languages that are spoken in the Balkans, such as: Croatian, Bosnian and Slovenian. It is not an easy task to copy them to google for translation; thus the country of origin remains a mystery. The flavour is not bad but quite weak compared to the South Korean counterpart. As far as strength is concerned, it is quite strong and a bit mellow compared to classic Nescafe. Don't expect a sharp kick with a headache after drinking this, but get ready to stay awake for a very long time.

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Preeti", "review":"We got the bottel at a bargain price but the problem with such coffees is that its expiry date is only a few months away. In our case it was 4 months. If it sounds too good to be true, thats because it probably is.\nNow about the coffee.. it has a beautiful and mild flavour. All in all it was a treat. But its best when consumed black. Milk overpowers its flavour and aroma.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Gold Espresso - Nescafe - 100g
description: Prodcut Description
brand_description: Nescaf√© is a brand of instant coffee made by the Vevey-based company Nestl√©. It comes in many different forms. The name is a portmanteau of the words "Nestl√©" and "caf√©". Nestl√© first introduced their flagship coffee brand in Switzerland on April 1, 1938.
reviews[0].review: I am not sure if there is any difference but catering stuff always taste better.. And we cant buy it at retail.. But for half the price of buying regular, even with the shipping charges it is worth it. There are 5 smaller packages inside while the other deal said it was a 1KG pack so not sure if that also has it but I did not take the chance.. 800 cups should last over an year for most families.. Since 50mg costs 75, just 500mg would end up costing as much as this 1kg pack.. The separate pack makes sure it dont go bad soon..  and it says on the pack to put it inside something air tight as it gets hard really fast if you leave it in the open. Even on bottles I use plastic to cover the opening so as to not let in any air other wise in a week it becomes hard and cant use it.The plastic on the edge of the cover makes sure its a little more tight and blocks more air..  Leaving it inside the fridge dont make any difference since you have to take it out to use it and it instantlyy takes the moisture outside so better to leave it outside.. Remember these are not retail packs.. and says not for retail sales..

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Pratham","review":"This is a reply to all those who said the cheese didnt melt.. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST!

i used about a third of the 70gm pack, to make the quantity shown above..

I used boiling water to submerge the cheese with twice the water, and left it for about 10 minutes, after which i used a tea strainer to filter out ths water and added some more hot water. After that i folded/pressed it using the spoon a few times before the cheese became usable and saggy.

I tasted it a bit and it was fine, not excellent but good.

Yes its costly, and yes mozarella cheese is easy to make, but i didn't want to undertake the task for a small quantity
This has longer shelf life

Overall it's as advertised","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Lalitha Royal","review":"The product is not up to the mark interms of quality & not even taste like mozerella cheese","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Seema Singh","review":"I thought  it is in a big jar. Saw an ad for  Real Activ 100% Tender Coconut Water so decided to try it instead of the fresh coconut water. To my surprise it tastes just like fresh coconut water...its Sweet & refreshing. Its a healthy alternative to sugary cold drinks in summer.
The quantity in one bottle is equal to the amount that you will get in one coconut. The price is also reasonable as compared to a fresh coconut so its cost effective.
It comes in an easy to carry bottle so now I can have my coconut water on the go. No hassle of peeling the coconut before drinking it. It can be easily stored and had whenever needed. It is especially convenient in winter as it is hard to find fresh coconut in winter in my city.
My kids love it too and I recommend everyone to go for it.","rating":"5","source":"Amazon"}]

The triangles (spreadable wedges; 8 pieces in one box) were very soft and succulent. Taste? Hmm, a tad too bland. If you compare with Indian Amul (processed cheese), this is more bland, softer and less salted. The plus? It's in the same cost-bracket as most Indian brands and can be used in almost everything - as a spread, dressing, sauce, cheese cake and more. My kids loved it. Minus? Considering its +100y old French legacy; I expected more "character". I found the fat and skimmed content in these wedges too bland for my taste. Still, its a good buy for multi-purpose use. Overall 8/10; go","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Amarkumar Patel","review":"Well packaged, fresh and good olive taste","rating":"5","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Peter","review":"I recently tried the Borges Green Pitted Olives in the 450g jar, and overall, I'm quite pleased with my purchase. As a self-proclaimed olive enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for good-quality olives to enjoy as a snack or to add to my dishes, and these olives definitely hit the mark.

The packaging is straightforward and practical. The 450g jar is a decent size, perfect for keeping in the pantry for whenever I have a craving for some olives. The twist-off lid is easy to open, and the resealable feature helps maintain the freshness of the olives after every use.

The olives themselves are plump and have a nice, firm texture. I appreciate that they are pitted, as it saves me the hassle of removing the pits myself. The brine they are packed in adds a pleasant tanginess to the flavor, which I quite enjoy. They're not overly salty, which is a plus, and the taste is consistent throughout the jar.

I've used these olives in a variety of ways ‚Äì from snacking straight out of the jar to adding them to salads, pasta dishes, and even pizza. They add a burst of savory flavor that complements a wide range of recipes. The jar size is great for larger gatherings or for keeping stocked up for frequent snacking.

While the olives themselves are quite tasty, I did notice a few occasional soft or slightly mushy ones in the jar. While this didn't detract too much from my overall enjoyment, it's something to keep in mind.

In terms of value, the 450g jar offers a decent amount of olives for the price, making it a reasonable option for olive lovers who want a convenient and versatile snacking solution.

To sum it up, the Borges Green Pitted Olives in the 450g jar are a flavorful and convenient choice for olive enthusiasts like myself. The plump texture, tangy brine, and versatility in usage make them a great addition to various dishes or a simple snack. Despite a few minor inconsistencies in texture, I'm satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these olives to anyone looking for a reliable option.

Pros:

Plump and firm texture.
Tangy brine enhances flavor.
Convenient packaging with a resealable lid.
Versatile usage in various dishes.
Reasonable value for the amount of olives.

Cons:

Occasional soft or mushy olives.","rating":"5","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Evan","review":"excellent product","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"}]

[{"reviewer_name":"Arkodip Roy","review":"good for those who are on the softer side of chocolate","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Shalini","review":"Quality is good and tasty for only hotmilk","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Shwetanshi Singh","review":"Cadbury Hot Chocolate Drink Powder Mix is a delicious and easy way to enjoy a warm, comforting cup of hot chocolate. Made with real Cadbury chocolate, this powder mix is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. Simply add hot water or milk to a mug, stir, and enjoy!

This hot chocolate is perfect for any occasion. Whether you're looking for a pick-me-up on a cold day or a cozy treat after dinner, Cadbury Hot Chocolate Drink Powder Mix is the perfect choice. It's also great for parties and gatherings. Just add some marshmallows and whipped cream, and you'll have a crowd-pleaser.

I've tried a lot of different hot chocolate powders, and Cadbury is by far my favorite. It's rich, creamy, and chocolaty, with just the right amount of sweetness. I love that it's made with real Cadbury chocolate, which gives it a unique flavor that you can't find in other brands.

If you're looking for a delicious and easy way to enjoy a cup of hot chocolate, I highly recommend Cadbury Hot Chocolate Drink Powder Mix. It's sure to become a new favorite!

Here are some of the pros and cons of Cadbury Hot Chocolate Drink Powder Mix:

Pros:

Made with real Cadbury chocolate
Rich, creamy, and chocolaty
Easy to make
Perfect for any occasion
Cons:

Can be a bit expensive
Not as healthy as some other hot chocolate brands
Overall, Cadbury Hot Chocolate Drink Powder Mix is a great choice for anyone looking for a delicious and easy way to enjoy a cup of hot chocolate. It's made with real Cadbury chocolate and is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. Just add hot water or milk to a mug, stir, and enjoy!","rating":"5","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Tanu Gupta","review":"In America mozzarella is very cheap and easy to find in every store, but I'm in Mizoram now and it's hard to get anything here. So fresh isn't an option, even frozen is hard to get. Dehydrated is the best option to have shipped in but it takes 6 hours of soaking the cheese chunks in water for the cheese to rehydrate properly. The directions say to use a few seconds in warm water but the inside of the cheese is still dry. While that could work with a powdered cheese product the water won't penetrate into the rest of the cheese.

Once the cheese is rehydrated the quality is fairly standard mozzarella. The little bits taste like mozzarella. They are nice, soft and creamy. I used them for pizzas where they melted very nicely.

Ideally the company would sell a 90-95% mozzarella and 5-10% parmesan blend for pizza but this worked well. It really hits the fresh made pizza craving and it's good to share with others.","rating":"5","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer","review":"Quite costly... doesn't melts even on warming/heating","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer","review":"It doesn't mix or melt in food even after soaking it as per directions","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"}]

Hope Dlecta Foods will change the date of expiry 2 months only","rating":"4","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Voluminous Lash Paradise Mascara
description: Take your lashes to paradise. Our 1st mascara for voluptuous volume and length. Soft wavy bristle brush holds maximum formula for a dramatic volumizing charge. 200plus bristles catch every lash for a full fringe effect. Smooth glide formula provides silky volume in 1 coat. Lashes are feathery soft to the touch. Women agreed: 91% saw in10se and volumized lashes and 87% saw more beautiful lashes. plus98% lengthening effect. Voluptuous Volume and Length Full Lash Fringe, Feathery Soft Soft Wavy Bristle Brush Smooth Glide Formula Place brush at base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes easily with soap and water. To safeguard L‚ÄôOreal Purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injuRed, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.

reviews[0].review: Ive been buying this mascara for a couple of years now and I love it. As I get older, I feel like my lashes are getting thinner. But after applying this, they look lush and long! Going over them 2-3 times, you almost look like you're wearing false eyelashes, but more natural! I usually get it at CVS or Target, but its pretty convenient to get it on amazon. I can't see spending $20-$40 for high end mascara when this works so great! And I noticed one of my students eyelashes looked great and she said she used this same one that I do. So it's good for a teenager or a grandmother. It just works!!
reviews[1].review: My new fav economic mascaraü§© i already have 4 months using this and they work perfectly! Easy to apply and wont make a mess. Even my mom wants me to buy one for herself, shes using mine now! So, üíØ recommended!.
reviews[2].review: Purchased this after falling in love with a sample sized Better than Sex by Too Faced mascara, but not it's full size price tag.  This was suggested as a dupe for it, and it's definitely the closest dupe I've found. The brush is the same shape and size- old style, not those new plastic ones.  It doesn't give me the over the top, false-lash look Too Faced did, but it's still pretty impressive.  Good for long but not necessarily full natural lashes, lasts around 12 hours.  I can't wear the waterproof king, bc it flakes off into my eyes, but the regular version didn't give me raccoon eyes, even after a particularly bad night when I fell asleep without taking it off first.  For the price, I'm sold- and if you look for coupons, there's almost always one around, so you can get it for about $5-6 at a brick and mortar store..

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Danielle D", "review":"This is a tanning accelerator for indoor tanning beds. It does have a light bronzer in it as well. It applied easily and had a nice smell. During your tanning session, the lamps feel significantly hotter when using this lotion. I didn't feel the tingle when it was applied, but after tanning my skin was redder and felt hotter. If you have used tingle lotions before, you will like this lotion.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Caitlin", "review":"I didn‚Äôt realize this was a tingle when I ordered it, so I‚Äôm apprehensive to try it in a tanning bed, but just putting it on my skin it‚Äôs nice and smells good","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"blord7777", "review":"The positive, great smell, now on to the rest...Let me start by saying I own my own tanning bed and have owned a tanning bed for almost 20 years, I just bought a new one last year, so I know about tanning and tanning lotions, and No, I am not the "Tanning Mom" . This tanning lotion is awful!! Tingle factor should not start before you get into the tanning bed and it should NEVER make you swell. My lotion arrived open and when I took it out of the package it was all over my hand and wrist and it burned, not tingled, but I cleaned it up and thought maybe it was just too much on me, so I tried it again today on my arm and again it burned and my wrist swelled up. My husband even noticed how bad it looked, he , being a funny guy, said I had a cankle on my wrist, HAHA, sleep on the couch tonight buddy!! Anyway, I threw it immediately into the garbage and got an icepack. I did not think about taking pictures until I remembered the review, and I am not taking it out of the garbage and trying it again, no review is worth that!!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Jamie C.", "review":"After trying all types of face SPF, this one is by far the best. First off I do use a face spf cream to start the day, just because it's part of my routine. But for the rest of the day I use pluxos. It is the perfect over makeup sunscreen. I'm a huge suncare supporter and it is probably the most important thing you can use on your face to keep your skin youthful.

I re-apply every few hours, it's moisturizing and it makes my skin feel the best out of all the sunscreens.

How can you not love this with all the skincare ingredients built in the formula. It's invisible and gives me a glowy hydrated look.

The only downside is they don't make a body spf spray or a face cream version for when I don't have makeup on or when I'm at the beach.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Naomi Ruth", "review":"As a face sunscreen it does what it says, but as a skin care product it does it even better. The anti aging is working well, I can see the reduction in wrinkles.

I don't really use this for the beach or when I'm hiking. I use it more for when I go out and have makeup on.

I use the cheaper creams on my face when I'm more active.

Since this is a little pricier, I use it when I have makeup and am outside and it's definitely worth it. It goes on invisible and hydrates my face very well.

Just be careful because it is easy to use a lot and it will get really dewy. A little goes a long way.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Drew Rush", "review":"Okay so for those who are saying it can be too dewy or glowy or oily, you're simply using too much LOL. Just put it farther away and use a few sprays, also, you'll save a lot more product.¬†

This face sunscreen spray is pretty much my favorite right now. I had supergoop, but it has too many chemicals. I also like that Pluxos is a small LA business. I saw their product at a popup in LA a little while back. The main thing is that it's essentially a face sunscreen moisturizer/skincare routine.

Pros: Face spf47 which is perfect protection for a sunscreen for face, invisible look, sets makeup really well actually, feels like a light mist, smell is a nice eucalyptus, tons of moisturizing ingredients, the vitamin c is great. Last, but most importantly, it goes on over my makeup!

Cons: It does smell like a light SPF, but a nice SPF with the eucalyptus. Which is way better than the other brands. But I did wish they made other scents since I love Vanilla and such and maybe that can mask the SPF completely. But I love that their scent is an aroma from the extracts and not a synthetic type chemical scent that most brands use.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Tootsie", "review":"Omg! First of all, the shipping was super fast!! This bonnet is amazing! If you already own one of these bonnets, remember that they are great gift items for Christmas, birthdays, etc. Tell everyone about these bonnets and continue to support Glow by Daye!!!  Also, the packaging is cute.  Glow by Daye, you get five stars and a high five from me!  I hope your business continues to grow because you deserve it! Voluptuous Volume and Length Full Lash Fringe, Feathery Soft Soft Wavy Bristle Brush Smooth Glide Formula Place brush at base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes easily with soap and water. To safeguard L‚ÄôOreal Purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. reviews[0].review: Ive been buying this mascara for a couple of years now and I love it. As I get older, I feel like my lashes are getting thinner. But after applying this, they look lush and long! Going over them 2-3 times, you almost look like you're wearing false eyelashes, but more natural! I usually get it at CVS or Target, but its pretty convenient to get it on amazon. I can't see spending $20-$40 for high end mascara when this works so great! And I noticed one of my students eyelashes looked great and she said she used this same one that I do. So it's good for a teenager or a grandmother. It just works!!
reviews[1].review: My new fav economic mascaraü§© i already have 4 months using this and they work perfectly! Easy to apply and wont make a mess. Even my mom wants me to buy one for herself, shes using mine now! So, üíØ recommended!.
reviews[2].review: Purchased this after falling in love with a sample sized Better than Sex by Too Faced mascara, but not it's full size price tag.  This was suggested as a dupe for it, and it's definitely the closest dupe I've found. The brush is the same shape and size- old style, not those new plastic ones.  It doesn't give me the over the top, false-lash look Too Faced did, but it's still pretty impressive.  Good for long but not necessarily full natural lashes, lasts around 12 hours.  I can't wear the waterproof king, bc it flakes off into my eyes, but the regular version didn't give me raccoon eyes, even after a particularly bad night when I fell asleep without taking it off first.  For the price, I'm sold- and if you look for coupons, there's almost always one around, so you can get it for about $5-6 at a brick and mortar store..

description: A dose of intense hydration and natural Collagen in Collagen Filler Moisture Day Lotion and Day/Night Cream is essential for younger-looking skin. Rich moisture instantly restores skin's cushion and bounce. Over time, the powerful natural Collagen helps fill in lines and wrinkles, leaving your skin smooth and plump. reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Aruna", "review":"Keeps my skin nice and smooth","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer", "review":"This Collagen Face Moisturizer by L'Oreal has rescued my facial and neck skin. After a brief stint with a retinol cream, my skin in both areas became overtly dry and developed many fine lines prematurely. This added years to my appearance, absolutely not to what I was aiming for! I am already a senior and wanted to age gracefully, just not so rapidly. So I turned to this collagen product as it falls within my affordability range. I was already using L'Oreal products successfully for my hair and cosmetics, so it is a brand I trust. This really does smooth out the many fine lines around my mouth and on my cheeks. It no longer looks permanently puckered, but I have to use it consistently both morning and night as well as occasionally needing to apply a lighter moisturizer during the day when conditions are especially dry. If I get lazy and skip an application, it shows the next day. It doesn't smooth out the fine lines that developed around my eyes, however. They are still noticeable, but are softened within tolerance so I don't use a separate eye cream. The crepe lines that developed on my neck and forehead also soften. I have been using this product for awhile now. One jar will typically last me a month and I will usually order the two-pack. I found that purchasing the two-pack through Amazon saves me money rather than buying this product at the store. That's a win-win to me. Overall, I am satisfied with the results the L'Oreal Collagen Moisturizer delivers and have made it a permanent part of my routine.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"shortwork", "review":"This is the most frequently bought product on Amazon for my family, I have counted - we have bought 48 jars of this cream since 2015. OMG!
It is a "working horse" everyday cream for my wife. She mostly used it during the day to moisturize her face skin and protect it from sun and wind. Of course it doesn't protect from UV light, but it makes the skin smooth, hydrated and healthy.  Never tried it myself, but my wife has this cream everywhere: at home, at the office , in her car, even in my car.

Pros:
The cream is non-greasy with a very good absorption. You shouldn't worry it won't leave any sticky, slimy films on your skin after absorption.  It will just fill your skin with moisture and confidence.
Can be used as a day or night cream.
Very slight and fresh fragrance.
Affordable price.

Cons:
No claims to this cream after 5 years of continuous  usage","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Kdb", "review":"I have been using this product for a couple of years now.  I use the 8 hour or 16 hour lipstick and most cleansers do not remove it easily.  This product works so well. With only one quick pass over my lips, it all comes off.  I used to use Clinique but the price was ridiculous for small amounts.  I highly recommend this for lipstick and eye makeup removal.  Also, feels great on the skin and has a light, pleasant fragrance.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"marilyn", "review":"UPDATE 7/28: I now have both the blue cap and pink cap. I use the pink one to remove regular stuff, and the blue for the tougher stuff. My same long wear lipstick didn't come off with the with pink, but with the blue again only took 3 swipes! Seriously I am floored!! Just make sure you shake vigorously to mix it evenly.\n\nWow. I think I may have found my holy grail makeup remover! I used it for the first time on a "full glam" face as I went to a pretty important event. I'm talking long wear cream eye shadow, long wear 24 hour liquid lipstick, and a double dose of setting pray. The whole nine-yards. And this stuff took care of it all. This bottle (blue cap) is bi-phase, so it has the oil looking stuff (no it's not oil) floating at the top of the bottle. It did not feel greasy, or heavy at all. For my eye makeup I held a soaked cotton round over my eye for a few seconds and I would say 85% of it came off with the first few swipes. Even my mascara. No eyelash loss either. It also did not sting my eyes. Then I did the residual clean up with another soaked piece of cotton. The thing that literally made me say "WOW" out loud, was my lipstick removal. I have been wearing the same stuff for years and it stays all day/night with zero transfer, but it can be a pain to get every last trace of it removed. In just three swipes, my lipstick was gone! And no heavy rubbing or scrubbing! I am TOTALLY sold on this stuff! I ended up using it all over my face to remove everything else, and it felt lightweight and clean, but "a bit much" for my face. I did use my Simple Brand Micellar to fully clean everything off as I prefer my anti-aging face cream. But I'm sure this would be great for those with dry skin to just leave as is and go to bed. WONDERFUL PRODUCT! Make sure you shake well each time you pour it.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Infallible Pro-Glow Foundation
description: Discover the new pro finish of long wear: Up to 24 hour wear with a hydrating glow. Lightweight and creamy, L‚ÄôOreal Paris' Infallible Pro Glow Foundation is a long lasting foundation that goes on smooth with a glow finish that lasts. Hydrating foundation has medium coverage and instantly hides imperfections for a clear complexion. This luminous foundation with SPF is ideal for normal to dry skin. Up to 24HR Foundation. Finish with Infallible Pro-Spray and Set for a lasting glow look. Octinoxate 3.01% Warnings. For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Customer", "review":"I LOVE this Pro Glow foundation! It makes me cringe to think about how much money I've wasted over the years between Lancome, Cover FX, Clinique and others when this foundation beats those high-end products in every way AND costs a fraction of the price!

For example, the Lancome R√©nergie Lift and Cover FX cream foundations both were great color matches for me, but both required touchups after a few hours even with primer.  I loved the look of Cover FX cream foundation on my skin (the dewy glow), but the transfer was terrible.  The Lancome matched my color but just looked so dull and needed to be touched up all the time too. Estee Lauder Double Wear had great staying power but settled into my fine lines and crows feet, which made me look older.  All of them were expensive, which would be OK if they lived up to their claims.

I literally bought this L'Oreal Pro Glow because I knew I wanted to try a new foundation, but most places are not offering samples during Covid 19. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a high-end foundation that might not be the right color etc.

So, I watched a lot of great YouTube reviews about the L'Oreal Pro Glow and thought I'd give it a try to just make due for awhile.  Instead, I was blown away with how beautiful this foundation was, the way it gave my 46 year-old skin a healthy glow, it never settled into my fine lines, looked radiant and in tact all day (even without primer), and did not cause any breakouts. I was also impressed that it gave me medium-full buildable coverage and looked great upclose or from a distance...never cakey or heavy looking.

L'Oreal Pro Glow is now my favorite foundation ever, and the fact that it's so affordable is just incredible.  For reference, I am a light-medium skin tone with neutral undertones. My Lancome R√©nergie Lift foundation color was 260, and I was N40 in Cover FX.  I have normal skin but break out easily if a product doesn't agree with my skin. The L'Oreal Pro Glo Natural Buff matched me perfectly and made my skin look and feel incredible.

Make sure you shake the Pro Glow foundation first. I've used a beauty blender or a foundation brush to apply, and both methods worked great.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Debra blanton", "review":"If you're looking for a foundation that delivers a smooth, natural-looking finish at a great price, I highly recommend trying out this one. The formula is lightweight and blends in flawlessly, giving a seamless coverage that lasts all day. It's perfect for those who prefer a subtle, natural look without feeling like they're wearing heavy makeup. Despite its affordable price, the foundation does not compromise on quality and delivers great results. Give it a try, and you won't be disappointed!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

description: For best results, use face moisturizer each night, gently smoothing over cleansed skin; newly revealed skin may be sensitive to sunlight

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"missy", "review":"Thanks to a free samples of all 4 steps of the new L'Oreal of Paris Rivitalift Bright Reveal brightening regimen from L'Oreal Paris, I've finally found a skin regimen that has made a visual difference! This is the first product I've ever used containing glycolic acid & it has revolutionized my skin care beliefs...because IT WORKS! From the first use my skin felt smoother, supple & pores were less visible. Im pushing 50 & my generation was all about worshipping the Sun- Im talking baby oil mixed with iodine laying on a bed of tin foil people!! All those years have taken a toll on my skin in the form of age spots which makes me look old & tired.
After a week using the Rivitalift Bright Reveal regimen, my skin tone was well on its way to becoming visibly less blotchy. After 2 weeks, the compliments from others began- like, "Are you losing weight? Did you just come back from vacation? You look so less stressed lately." Working on my 3rd week, so I'm excited to see the final result at the end of the 30 day Challenge. Right now I can sincerely say, "I'm feeling more energized because I know I'm exuding a brightness & confidence I had lost!"
The Daily Scrub Cleanser used day & night exfoliates the rough, dry skin without the over the top scratching- your-face-off feeling most exfoliators have aling with the glycolic acid with vitamin C & Pro-retinol seems to be brightening my skin right before my eyes.
Next, the Brightening Peel Pads pads...using these each evening after cleansing. The Daily Cleanser works so well, there isn't much residual dirt left on the pads, but it does make my skin feel extra clean & refreshed.
Then comes my FAV...applying the Dual Overnight Moisturizer complex. It comes in a cool dual red/white pump that mixes a clear serum with a light cream. I awaken with the same hydrating effects- suppleness & plumpness, as when I initially applied it & it lasts until I cleanse again in the morning.
Finally, I apply the Day Moisturizer with SPF 30 to prevent additional Sun damage. It is a light, but powerful moisturizer & also contains the glycolic acid to work on vanishing those blotchy spots throughout the day.
I'm sold already...can't wait to compare before/after pics at the 30 day challenge end! #GotItFree","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Match Blush 150 Candy Cane Pink
description: Botana Luxe Mineral Blushes help your skin tone look even and ageless in any season, without causing acne or irritating sensitive skin. Our loose powder blush collection features 12 shades for a light to full buildable look for everyone, regardless of age or skin type. Luxe Mineral Blushes bind to the natural oils in your skin, forming a protective barrier against environmental elements while allowing skin to breathe. Look vibrant and alluring all day long with natural pigments that provide clean, long-lasting coverage that looks fresh all day. Won't Clog Pores Botana Luxe's mission is to provide skin care products that offer complete freedom from pore-clogging ingredients. You'll never find pore irritating or pore clogging ingredients like Bismuth Oxychloride, D&C Red Pigments or Dimethicone. Be a Timeless Beauty Age Defying - Botana Luxe Luxe Mineral Blush resists settling into fine lines and creases. No drawing attention to wrinkles and imperfections. Lightweight, silky-smooth and lasts all day without caking. Botana Luxe Mineral Blush creates a non-powdery, silky smooth finish that is natural looking in any setting. Made with Clean Ingredients. Always. We source only premium botanicals, in quality controlled facilities in the USA. Our lightweight buildable blush line was formulated with scientific principles and years of research for a healthy makeup that helps your skin look and feel radiant. Contains no parabens, phthalates, artificial fragrances, talc, fillers or other harsh irritants. The result is a hypoallergenic blush that is gentle enough for dry, oily, normal and sensitive skin. For long-wear base makeup that matches your skin tone and type, add Botana Luxe Mineral Blush to your beauty regimen today.

brand[0].review: I was referred to a competing product that was more expensive. The main reason I went with this brand is price and color availability. I am a brunette and upon reading reviews and my own experience, I knew that I had to go with a lighter shade than my eyebrow or hair color. The referred brand only offered shades that were either lighter or darker than this one (blond or brunette). This one is dark blonde which works perfectly. Its frustrating when you can't return an opened/used product like this, so be careful with the color you choose (I don't want my brows darker than my hair and for some reason I have always found eyebrow products are fairly dark when compared to their color name). Will and have purchased again!
brand[1].review: First off I have very blonde and very sparse eyebrows. With no brow makeup they are nearly invisible. I am so self conscious about it that my husband has still never seen me with no brow makeup. I have been using wunderbrow for five years now. That stuff was life altering because I didn‚Äôt have to worry about accidentally grazing my brow and the makeup coming off. Decided to try this based on the reviews and it is inexpensive compared to other highly rated name brand brow product. I am now officially converted. Is this perfect? NO. But it is the best I have found for someone who has virtually no brows bald patches in their brow. What I love 1) if you are used to liquid brow makeup this stuff goes on like a F****** breeze. 2) I live in Southern California and when I get out of the shower after exercising on a hot day I find myself sweating straight away (bathroom has little ventilation when AC is on) when I would try to put on wunderbrow with damp sweaty skin it is very difficult to apply. This stuff goes on like a pro, what sweaty skin? 3) after a 30 min run this stuff stays in place (don‚Äôt wipe your brow though when sweaty will slightly come off LOL) 4) it applies so fast, my brow routine is now effortless 5) covers my bald patches and often don‚Äôt need to touch up with a pencil 6) when I wake up in the morning it doesn‚Äôt clump together. Often with wunderbrow I would have to touch up spots that kind of coagulated I guess you could say over night but when I try to go over with a pencil would just make it look worse. Not with this stuff!! This stuff seems to have a stickier formula than wunderbrow making the staying power better. I also love the brush it comes with the bristles are perfect whichever end you use and I like how the spooley makes hair like strokes. THIS IS NOT WATERPROOF. But the best I have tried when comes to getting wet. I don‚Äôt think there will ever be a truly water or off makeup. Yes it stays on when wet and through exercise but you still can‚Äôt touch it without smudging when wet. Just don‚Äôt think you can go off for a swim and except to keep perfect brows in tack.
brand[2].review: I have so many eyebrow tints but this one is the best for me.  I use an eyebrow brush to more accurately paint my sparse eyebrows and then use the masacara wand to softly brush it out.  I purchased dark blonde and it‚Äôs a great color for me.  I‚Äôm ashy brunette with blonde highlights and this color is the best for me.

brand[0].review: I have medium-course mid length wavy hair and this stuff is a life saver! I just put a half pump in my hair after a shower, blow-dry or let dry naturally and it is silky smooth and frizz free for two days , I live in Atlanta so humidity is a huge issue for me in the summer time. brand[1].review: The product works as advertised.  However, when you take the lid off, the pump part of the bottle is stuck in the lid which leaves the product open and susceptible to leakage during shipping.  You have to pull the pump out of the lid and push it back onto the bottle.  If any product had seeped out during shipping, I would have returned it.  In my case, it was jammed onto the bottle tight enough that the product did not leak out.

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Johann Arroyo Arce", "review":"Yes, as you read it: you should have this on hand in case of emergencies.

I bought it for my face and it turned out to be a hit on my skin. One day while I was playing with one of my cats he scratched my face and hand. I immediately ran to the bathroom to wash the entire affected area (I have problems healing and my skin is very sensitive for this reason the "drama") and instead of applying any medicine I decided to put the serum on. I did not feel any discomfort, not the typical itch that I get every time my cats scratch me, the skin did not swell and I did not present more redness than normal. The wound stopped bleeding (which is often difficult for me) and after three days (I applied it three times a day) I could see the wound begin to fade into my skin. After a week the skin was completely healthy and to date: you cannot see where the accident happened.

My first bottle is completely empty but I already have another to continue using this wonderful product.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Adelynn", "review":"Super product. It will probably go longer if you use less but the older you get, the more you tend to slather on a good product. Lol, since it says collagen, I do use that one at night and hydration in the day. name: White Perfect Laser Brightening Treatment Water
description: The secret to smooth and glowing skin. Gentle exfoliation in 1 simple step. NEW Revitalift Derm Intensives 5% Pure Glycolic Acid Toner, a daily peeling toner that smooths skin texture and reveals glowing, smoother, brighter skin. How It Works: This daily peeling toner gently yet powerfully exfoliates dead skin cells to smooth skin texture and reveal smoother and brighter skin ready for Derm Intensives Serum application. Effective, low pH formula with: - 5% Pure Glycolic Acid, an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) recommended by dermatologists as an effective exfoliator to remove dead skin cells and help increase cell turnover to reveal fresher, brighter skin. - Aloe Vera, a botanical extract, helps to soothe and moisturize the skin for daily use. What's New: Dermatologist-Validated formula with 5% Pure Glycolic Acid and Aloe Vera is designed for daily use and suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Effective for all skin tones. The Result: Immediately skin feels smoother, refreshed and clean. Overall skin quality looks improved. In 1 week, skin feels softer and looks renewed with a healthy glow. Appearance of skin imperfections are reduced. Overtime, dark spots start to visibly improve. New Revitalift Derm Intensives 5% Pure Glycolic Acid Toner is Fragrance Free, Alcohol Free, Paraben Free, Allergy Tested, Dye Free, Mineral Oil Free. Dermatologist tested suitable for sensitive skin. See results or your money back, guaranteed. Money back guarantee, up to 19.99 dollars (sales tax will not be refunded). Restrictions apply. For details, call 1-800-630-5585. Valid in the 50 U.S/D.C. Void where prohibited. Limit 1 refund per person and per household.

reviews[0].review: I have the thinnest, most sensitive skin.  I tried glycolic acid 25% and it disrupted my skin barrier too much.  This however is perfect.  My skin looks more taught, and flawless.  The lines on my forehead diminished.  It only took a week to see a difference.  My early AM routine is to cleanse face then use skinceuticals retinol, then wait, followed by a cold shower while deep cleansing face, after that I apply this toner with my hands along with rosewater with glycerin then I wait, and finally I apply moisturizer and SPF.  I also do a clay mask once a week.  Nothing has delivered on the results as much as this routine for me.  I also take Antony's collagen, and Hum Collagen Love, biotin, and niacin and use a red light panel.  And finally I practice face yoga.  My 34 year old face has transformed.  It is subtle, but I see and feel the difference.  I now look healthy and my age.  I noticed an improvement with each implementation of these tools.  And soon I'll be adding methylene blue as well.
reviews[1].review: I've only used this once so far but as a skincare newbie I'm glad I got a product with only 5% glycolic acid. It was slightly tingly but didn't  leave my skin irritated. It got a little red at first but that went away within hours. I have a normal/oily skin.

name: Everfresh Anti Dandruff Shampoo
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"AAF", "review":"My scalp was always dry, itchy and flaky in the winter. It was so annoying and not to mention embarrassing! I read about this shampoo on a blog and figured I didn't have much to lose. I'm happy to say that it really helped! I no longer had the constant itch and my flakes all but went away. I don't wash my hair everyday so I decided to use this every time I washed my hair. I have long hair (mid back) and I used just under a quarter sized amount and massaged it onto my scalp and crown. I used it all winter and less than a quarter of it is gone. So I feel it's a really good value. I would recommend this to anyone with a dry itchy scalp!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Starr Taylor", "review":"I can honestly say, I have used many different kinds of dandruff shampoo. From organic to Head and Shoulders, and none of them worked. It left my hair dry and the dandruff stayed the same. I have been using Philip B for about 3 weeks now, and I definitely see progress. I used to have dandruff like crazy; itchy, dry, uncomfortable scalp. With this shampoo, the drandruff is rapidly going away. What I like is that it doesn't dry my hair, and I have curly hair. I honestly don't mind the smell, but it has a very minty/ tar smell to it. The best thing I have ever used!!! The reason why I gave it 4 stars was because of how expensive it is for the size, but it's worth it! Definitely will be ordering more as soon as I run out.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Stephen", "review":"I have been using the product for well over a decade with great results. Recently I purchased one bottle from Amazon and one directly from Philip B. Both bottles now are a brown/green color instead of bright yellow, have a terribly strong tar oder, and completely strip hair of oils. See new vs old color in photo. I contacted Philip B to ask them about this, and the response was that this is a new slightly different mixture with a higher percentage of tar, giving it a "richer color and odor." The old bright yellow product and this new ugly smelly product both say 0.7% tar, so if there was an intended change, it was not indicated on the bottle. I was willing to pay $40+ for years since it was so good. It is now terrible and I am returning this bottle and won't buy it again.","rating":"1.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"L. Arakelian", "review":"Ive tried quite a few anti flake shampoos over the years and this one works the best. Normally, Id never spend this much for an anti flake shampoo but I spent $300 on a keratin treatment and since this product is sodium sulfate free its safe for keratin treated hair. The smell is very medicinal but not terrible. Best part is it works extremely well. My scalp gets flaky, I wet my hair, put this on and massage it into my scalp, let it sit a few mins and then rinse and the itch and flakes are gone. Its worth the money.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"chris", "review":"I have been using this for about 2 years now. Its one of the best I have ever found and I have gone through a lot. It actually makes me cringe on how much I have needed to spend to find one that actually works. Is it perfect no, but its better than anything i have found. Its a small bottle but a little goes a long way. Wash your hair twice in a row and it will lather much better the second time. My head doesn't itch anymore, for the most part, and flakes are kept to a minimal if not non-existent on most days.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Danielle", "review":"I've dealt with flaky scalp (mostly near my forehead area) my entire life. As a tween i began trying everything. From head & shoulders & neutrogena, to higher-priced salon-only shampoos. I've tried raw egg, i've tried an oil i concocted myself from essential oils & jojoba when i worked in a natural bath & skincare store (that helped a lot but was nonetheless OIL and didn't get rid of it fully). THIS SHAMPOO IS THE ONLY THING that works. I'm pretty sure it's the blend of both the coal tar (which I'll grant you, isn't the healthiest solution but it's the one that works), and the zinc, as well as the other essential oil ingredients.

I only use it in the front of my hair. I wet it all, apply a little, then other shampoo to the rest of my hair & rinse. Then reapply & really get it rubbed into my scalp (it of course lathers much better the 2nd time) and let it sit for 3-5 minutes while I scrub the rest of my body, then rinse & condition. i've found i DO have to do it twice, or it doesn't really 'take'. But I never have flakes. Ever. Until I have to wash my hair and I'm without it.

It IS a little drying to my chemically treated hair, but not bad at all (my hair is long, fine & there's 2 tons of it, so i need all the moisture i can get). But that's why I use another shampoo on the rest of my hair (as well as the fact that it's coal tar, I try to minimize how much of my scalp absorbs that).

FYI the II version DOES NOT WORK for me AT ALL. It's so hard to find this original version & I pray they make it forever!!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer", "review":"somehow originals I bought at shop had more oil floating in the ingredient and worked better on my dandruff than these did....","rating":"2.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"J. Davis", "review":"I was really hoping this would work as well for me as it has for so many others, but alas, it did not. I have seborrheic dermatitis and had been using Neutrogena T-Gel and the Target off-brand for more than a year. They were helpful in managing it, but only for a day or two. They definitely did not clear it up for any significant amount of time. So I had high hopes for Philip B.

The good news is that it works just as well for me as T-Gel. The bad news is that it is more than twice the price and doesn't work any better. So while it was fine, it was definitely not worth the crazy price for me (although if it really works for you, then it's priceless). It smells medicinal, which doesn't bother me, but I know some people hate that.

I am going to try Shea Moisture's African Black Soap shampoo next. Eventually I am going to act like a grown-up and go back to the dermatologist, but for now, I don't wanna.

So based on the sheer number of glowing reviews, I am not sorry I gave this a one-time shot, even though it is a huge splurge, and I think it might be worth a try for others. But it didn't work especially well for me, unfortunately.","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Men‚Äôs Expert Vita Lift SPF 15 Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Moisturizer
description: L'Oreal Paris Men's Expert Vita Lift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Moisturizer 1.6 fl oz (Pack of 2) is formulated specifically for wrinkles, sagging skin, and loss of firmness. Fortified Pro-Retinol A, a form of Vitamin A, helps reduce wrinkles and sagging skin while firming up the face and neck. Active Defense System (ADS), is a patented system that protects your skin against irritation, so you‚Äôre less likely to get redness, burning, or tightness. SPF 15 protects your skin against damaging UVA (aging) and UVB (burning) rays. How To Use: Every morning, squeeze a dime-size dollop of product into the palm of your hand. Then rub between your palms and apply to your face. Every night, use Vita Lift Anti-Wrinkle & Firming Moisturizer. For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

But it smells like exactly what it is - a bunch of clay and mud mixed with oils, lol. Very "natural" smelling. It must be the dead sea mud, because it's a salty, vaguely Play-Doh smell? name: Micellar Water 3 in 1 Refreshing
brand:
[{"reviewer_name":"NYgal","review":"TL;DR: Does what it promises; gently cleans thoroughly without harsh rubbing or harsh surfactants while nourishing & hydrating the skin.
You DO need to rinse it off though. The RoseWater & Waterproof ones are the best in the lineup. I‚Äôve finished my second bottle and will be rebuying.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
HAS MANY ADVANTAGES & VERY FEW DRAWBACKS

Pros:
‚Ä¢Works
‚Ä¢Gentle
‚Ä¢Soothing
‚Ä¢Affordable
‚Ä¢No Sulfates
‚Ä¢No Alcohols
‚Ä¢No Fragrance
‚Ä¢Non-Stripping
‚Ä¢Non-Sensitizing
‚Ä¢Non-Comedogenic
‚Ä¢Subtle aroma/scent
‚Ä¢Nourishing ingredients
‚Ä¢Doesn‚Äôt aggravate acne
‚Ä¢Doesn‚Äôt exacerbate acne
‚Ä¢Doesn‚Äôt irritate my eyes
‚Ä¢Doesn‚Äôt leave much residue
‚Ä¢Suitable for very sensitive skin
‚Ä¢Suitable for dry & balanced skin
‚Ä¢Suitable for oily-dehydrated skin
‚Ä¢Dissolves oilbased cosmetics well
‚Ä¢Dissolves waterbased cosmetics well
‚Ä¢Removes any filth on the skin‚Äôs surface
‚Ä¢Removes any excess sebum on the skin‚Äôs surface

Cons:
‚Ä¢Adds less hydration than advertised
‚Ä¢Removing heavy mineral sunscreens takes effort
‚Ä¢Waterproof/waterresistant cosmetics takes effort
‚Ä¢It removes thin ointment like neosporin but it doesn‚Äôt fully remove thick ointments, such as, vaseline, aquaphor & cerave healing ointment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DOES WHAT IT PROMISES

Compared to the other micellar waters I‚Äôve tried, it does seem to replace some of the hydration you lose from cleansing off your sebum & sweat

At the end of a day my skin will have some filth, sebum, eyeliner, eyebrow powder, mascara, tinted hybrid sunscreen & pore blurring primer on it.
It‚Äôs mild unlike harsh makeup wipes that tug at your skin & have tons of preservatives. All I need to do is soak both sides of a thick (‚Äúpremium‚Äù) cotton pad with the solution and wipe with each side to get my face & neck clean. Then I‚Äôm ready to rinse with cool water and follow up with either a face wash or a wet microfiber makeup remover cloth (all micellar waters have surfactants that should be washed off the face)

The first step of my nightly skincare routine. After I finish cleaning I wipe my face with Stridex (toner) pads. The pad is always free of residue so I‚Äôm certain that this is cleaning effectively!

Note: The Rose water version will probably only be 4/5 stars for people who prefer to regularly wear very heavy makeup, waterproof makeup or water-resistant mineral sunscreens. Try Garnier‚Äôs waterproof version or one of Bioderma‚Äôs micellar water.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
GOOD FOR VARIOUS SKIN TYPES

My skin type is combination
Lips & Chin = Dry
T-Zone & next to the nose = Oily
Rest of the face = Balanced/Normal

so I needed a makeup remover/pre-cleanser that‚Äôs compatible  with my entire face and this fits the bill!
It sufficiently cleanses my oily areas without stripping the balanced areas and it keeps my dry areas hydrated

I mainly use this on my face & neck and it‚Äôs works just as well on both areas.
My face is acneic and normal-resilient. My neck is acne-free and normal-sensitive.

I felt the need to test the acidity of this product before saying it won‚Äôt sensitize your skin because many people experience irritation or barrier damage from regularly using cleansers & toners. The healthiest skin has a pH no higher than 5.0. It appears this Micellar Rose Water has a pH right between 4.5 & 5.0 (see picture) so you don‚Äôt have to worry about it altering your skin‚Äôs healthy acidity level.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A GREAT ADDITION TO THE LINE UP

I‚Äôve tried the ‚ÄúAll-in-1 Waterproof‚Äù version (Clear bottle, Blue Cap) & it‚Äôs the best if you want a deep clean very quickly. IIRC it leaves a bit more product residue, lacks skin nourishing additives & doesn‚Äôt hydrate; so it‚Äôs not the best choice for everyone.

The ‚ÄúAll-in-1 Mattifying‚Äù version (Clear Bottle, Green Cap) I can‚Äôt recommend. Acne prone individuals may gravitate towards it because it reduces shine, oil & bacteria temporarily but; none of the ingredients ‚Äúpurify pores‚Äù and using tons of denatured alcohol on your face daily is not great for your lipid barrier. People with super oily skin should probably buy one of the other micellar waters and use it as their first cleanser then wash off the residue with a foaming cleanser, benzoyl peroxide cleanser or a salicylic acid cleanser.

The ‚ÄúAll-in-1 Brightening‚Äù version (Translucent Yellow Bottle, Yellow Cap) is okay but vitamin c needs to be on your skin for at least 30 minutes before being washed off to brighten skin or lighten pigment and you‚Äôre absolutely not supposed to regularly leave micellar water on your face for more than a couple minutes.

The ‚ÄúAll-in-1 Sensitive‚Äù version (Clear Bottle, Pink Cap) is the most similar to this one in my experience. I would recommend it for people with sensitive skin that isn‚Äôt prone to roughness nor dehydration.

The nourishing ingredients added to this Rose water version of the product makes it a stand out!

Propanediol is a good humectant & emollient making it good for dehydrated skin conditions. It also boosts the effectiveness of things like salicylic acid.
Glycerin is also an amazing humectant.
Rosa damascena flower water may have skin conditioning, antimicrobial, antioxidant & anti-inflammatory benefits making it great for both dry & acneic skin.
Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside is a good cleansing surfactant for keeping your skin clean but it‚Äôs very mild compared to others making it good for sensitized skin.
Salicylic acid slows how quickly acne bacteria reproduces & purifies the pores.

description: This all-in-1 hydrating micellar cleansing water is a facial cleanser and makeup remover that is surprisingly powerful, yet gentle on skin. The Water Rose Micellar Cleansing Water for all skin types effectively cleanses, removes makeup and hydrates skin. Like a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing. This facial cleanser removes makeup, leaving skin perfectly clean without over drying. This Garnier Water Rose Micellar Cleansing Water is gentle on skin and can be used to remove face makeup and eye makeup. This gentle cleanser is vegan and formulated without alcohol, oils and fragrance. Water Rose Micellar Cleansing Water is formulated with 99% natural origin ingredients. The remaining 1% of the formula is to ensure its sensoriality and preservation.

name: Youth Code Skin Illuminator Tinted All-in-1 Moisturizer SPF 20
brand:
[{"reviewer_name":"Claudia","review":"I have olive skin that doesn't really wrinkle even though I"m almost 50, but I've always dark circles under my eyes. The shade of my skin is light to medium, but I really intentionally wanted to get fair as I wanted this as a highlighter and something that would distract from my dark circles and lighten up my face.  Few things really seem to cover the dark circles.  This stuff however is the most amazing stuff I've ever tried for my under eye circles; it doesn't so much "cover" them as replaces them with light, but the end result is they are not visible.  Rather than try to fill in the whole under-eye area, I dab this stuff on in the deepest hollow of the eye and tap it on with my finger. I don't rub it in but allow it to soak in, and if necessary remove any excess.  I also use this amazing stuff right under my eyebrows and right on top of my cheeks where the top of the cheekbone is.  It lights up my face and makes it look luminous.  I think the trick to this product is that you don't use it as a concealer and don't apply it heavily.  I have tried all sorts of expensive concealers but this light reflector looks better than anything I've ever tried. I also tried it on a friend who is much younger and does not have olive skin but rather caucasian pinkish skin. In her case, I put it under her eyes (she does have hollows even though in her 20s), and also under the brow and on top of the cheekbone.  It gave her a boost of luminosity, and lit up her face.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Eda","review":"This is the only brightener that works to be honest. Very light and easy to use. Don‚Äôt need to use any concealer at all when you have this. Bought many in the past. Hope they don‚Äôt stop selling this.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"A. Lejeune","review":"I'm super pale, and I've used this as a concealer and a highlighter, so this might not apply to only highlighter users.

Pros:
Applies easily, very nice feel neither too thick or too thin.
Buildable without caking
Not glittery or shimmery
No skin irritation on my sensitive skin

Cons:
Product has an applicator brush on the end. The product is in the tube. It is necessary to turn the tube (multiple clicks) to finally get the product to disperse. To me, that's a waste of space and a bit deceptive of the amount of product when looking at the packaging. It is also difficult to dispense the desired amount of product by the clicking system. It is uneven, and one click may dispense excess product, while another click may dispense nothing.
Since the product is not glittery, shimmery or dewy, it will cake with overpowdering

Cons if you're pale and looking for a concealer:
This is a nice color match for the extremely pale.
It is excellent at covering freckles and minor blemishes.
For pale people it won't work as a highlighter, because it will be skin tone.
It is ok at covering the undereye area, and I would suggest it as a touch up only. It creases, even with light application of an undereye setting powder.","rating":"4.0","source":"Amazon"}]
description:

 Light Infusing Concealer
 Reduce dark spots or shadows
 Highlight complexion
 Define key features

Apply under eyes, on the cheekbones and nose as needed and blend.

For External Use Only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

name: Revitalift Miracle Blur Instant Eye Smoother
description: It's not a moisturizer. It's not a foundation. It's more than a primer: introducing miracle blur, the first-of-its-kind instant skin smoothing finishing cream. Miracle blur was specially formulated with a distinctive cushiony texture that instantly blurs lines, wrinkles, pores and uneven texture. This unique finishing cream blends seamlessly into skin so it instantly looks and feels smooth, leaving a velvet-soft matte finish. A finishing cream in the truest sense, revitalift miracle blur should be the final step in every woman's skincare routine, applied after moisturizer. It can also be worn under foundation for smoother, more even application and wear.¬† Why is it different? Revitalift's first finishing cream that delivers instant results opti-blur technology diffuses light on skin for a soft-focus effect that instantly smoothes lines and wrinkles, hides pores and minimizes little flaws and imperfections.

name: Unlimited Mascara Washable
description: Create the high-volume lash look of your dreams with COVERGIRL Lash Blast Clean Volume Mascara. The volumizing mascara has a clean, vegan formula free of parabens, sulfates, talc, and mineral oil that infused with argan and marula oils, leaving lashes feeling conditioned. This long-lasting vegan mascara creates 10x the volume of bare lashes with no smudging or clumping. The brush applicator separates and defines for longer, fuller lashes. To use, start at the base of your lashes, wiggle the brush from side to side from base to tip to lift and shape; Layer as desired. Pro-tip: To build dramatic lash thickness, use an eyelash primer and wait 30 seconds to dry before applying COVERGIRL Lash Blast Clean Volume Mascara.

Then, before the primer dries apply the fiber-rich mascara on top of the primed lashes to create a show-stopping lash look. Repeat on other eye. Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame or heat. To safeguard L‚ÄôOral purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Johann Arroyo Arce", "review":"Yes, as you read it: you should have this on hand in case of emergencies.\nI bought it for my face and it turned out to be a hit on my skin. One day while I was playing with one of my cats he scratched my face and hand. I immediately ran to the bathroom to wash the entire affected area (I have problems healing and my skin is very sensitive for this reason the "drama") and instead of applying any medicine I decided to put the serum on. I did not feel any discomfort, not the typical itch that I get every time my cats scratch me, the skin did not swell and I did not present more redness than normal. The wound stopped bleeding (which is often difficult for me) and after three days (I applied it three times a day) I could see the wound begin to fade into my skin. After a week the skin was completely healthy and to date: you cannot see where the accident happened.\nMy first bottle is completely empty but I already have another to continue using this wonderful product.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Adelynn", "review":"Super product. Absorbs well and no stickiness afterwards. Leave your skin more hydrated. There is no fragrance, which is hard to find these days but a blessing when you do find it, for those with sensitive skin and allergies.  I honestly can‚Äôt tell there is a big difference between the collagen and hydration, but both definitely do hydrate. One bottle, used twice a day, about 5 drops each time, lasts me a little over a month. It will probably go longer if you use less but the older you get, the more you tend to slather on a good product. Lol, since it says collagen, I do use that one at night and hydration in the day. I know the collagen production decreases with age, especially after 40, BUT a small part of me want to think it helps a tiny bit.  Cant Hurt.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Nakwon Yoon", "review":"I will comeback with updated if I get any result","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

description: We Keep Our Promises Immediately Fills Creases and Re-Plumps Skin Diminishes the Look of Even Deep Wrinkles Exclusive Fusion Of RoC Retinol + Hyaluronic Acid As you age, your skin's ability to renew itself slows. Skin loses its elasticity and wrinkles become more evident. As your skin cell turnover continues to slow, wrinkles become deeper and more settled. RoC Retinol Correxion Deep Wrinkle Filler is an intensive, anti-wrinkle formula that immediately fills creases and re-plumps skin. With daily use, it continues to improve the look of skin so that even deep wrinkles appear diminished in as little as four weeks. The result - younger-looking, more beautiful skin. How it works: This breakthrough, dual-action formula is specially developed to target wrinkles, with an exclusive fusion of hyaluronic acid and pure RoC Retinol: Hyaluronic acid to help immediately hydrate and plump skin RoC Retinol, a clinically proven wrinkle-fighting ingredient Results After Clinical Testing Immediately: Creases are filled to diminish the appearance of fine lines Re-plumped skin is softer and smoother After 4 weeks: The look of crow's feet and deep facial wrinkles are diminished This exclusive formula is: Non-comedogenic Dermatologist tested RoC has been a leading French skincare brand for over 50 years. younger-looking skin. Strong partnerships with dermatologists have contributed to our expertise in understanding skincare and developing clinically proven products, which are highly effective, yet suitable for all skin types. Also try our other RoC Retinol Correxion products to diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: I read the testimonials and was skeptic that so many people said they had great results. But it wasn't much money so I figured I'd give this product a try. When I first opened it I noticed a nice fragrance. It wasn't too strong. The cream glides on really smoothly and I don't need much. I noticed results under my eyes after 2 days. I've been using this product for over a week now and the fine lines under my eyes are gone. There are 2 more lines that are fading. And, I'm no longer using the other stuff I was using before. I'm not sure what makes Roc's product different from other retinol products on the market, but I'm highly impressed. I was considering asking my doctor for a prescription retinoid but I don't think I need it now. I'm 36 and lines were beginning under my eyes that made me feel tired, but they're almost completely gone now. My eyes feel more awake and I don't look tired anymore.
reviews[1].review: This is a lovely product!  No scent, thank goodness!  I use it twice a day: once after my shower in the morning and once before bed... I am DEFINITELY seeing a difference in the fine lines..  My face also looks brighter!  I will make sure i have a back up of this product!  ITS GREAT!!
reviews[2].review: The smell is not so great, it softens wrinkles and it‚Äôs good quality. I buy every different kind of wrinkle eraser and this works as well as other, more expensive wrinkle release. Peace

description: We Keep Our Promises Immediately Fills Creases and Re-Plumps Skin Diminishes the Look of Even Deep Wrinkles Exclusive Fusion Of RoC Retinol + Hyaluronic Acid As you age, your skin's ability to renew itself slows. Skin loses its elasticity and wrinkles become more evident. As your skin cell turnover continues to slow, wrinkles become deeper and more settled. RoC Retinol Correxion Deep Wrinkle Filler is an intensive, anti-wrinkle formula that immediately fills creases and re-plumps skin. With daily use, it continues to improve the look of skin so that even deep wrinkles appear diminished in as little as four weeks. The result - younger-looking, more beautiful skin. reviews[0].review: I read the testimonials and was skeptic that so many people said they had great results. But it wasn't much money so I figured I'd give this product a try. When I first opened it I noticed a nice fragrance. It wasn't too strong. The cream glides on really smoothly and I don't need much. I noticed results under my eyes after 2 days. I've been using this product for over a week now and the fine lines under my eyes are gone. There are 2 more lines that are fading. And, I'm no longer using the other stuff I was using before. I'm not sure what makes Roc's product different from other retinol products on the market, but I'm highly impressed. I was considering asking my doctor for a prescription retinoid but I don't think I need it now. I'm 36 and lines were beginning under my eyes that made me feel tired, but they're almost completely gone now. My eyes feel more awake and I don't look tired anymore.
reviews[1].review: This is a lovely product!  No scent, thank goodness!  I use it twice a day: once after my shower in the morning and once before bed... I am DEFINITELY seeing a difference in the fine lines..  My face also looks brighter!  I will make sure i have a back up of this product!  ITS GREAT!!
reviews[2].review: The smell is not so great, it softens wrinkles and it‚Äôs good quality. I buy every different kind of wrinkle eraser and this works as well as other, more expensive wrinkle release. Peace

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"MB", "review":"I love this product for fighting wrinkles, but it is so harsh.  I have sensitive/dry skin (which of course, shows wrinkles the most) and being of "that certain age,"  my skin is extra dry and sensitive.  I used this religiously, but ended up with my eyes almost sealed shut from a reaction to it and my skin burned, even when I limited my use to once or twice a week.  Got rid of the wrinkles, but also got rid of my skin!!  I won't give up using it, because it is amazing on wrinkles, but I recommend not using it every night - use it a couple of nights on, then a couple of nights off.  My face would be red after using it this way, but not burned.  A friend of mine recommended another skin care product - she's into organic - and told me to try Bel Essence (comes in an oil or cream, I used both - I've been buying it from their website but it's available here too)(","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Donna Rae Hansford", "review":").  This solved the reaction problem to Roc.  Not only did it help my skin in general, but using it with Roc - no burning, no bad reactions.  I talked to my doctor about it, and he told me that the natural oils in Bel Essence contain high amounts of Vitamin E and other nutrients that help the skin heal and stay healthy.  If you love Roc (and I am a HUGE fan), I recommend using Bel Essence with it, to get the good effects of Roc without the bad. Not only does it keep the results from the retinol permanent, my skin kept getting better - lines and discolorations were still going away even when I reduced the number of times I used the retinol. description: It‚Äôs never too early to start taking care of your skin. Oil free Ideal Clean Foaming Gel Cleanser gently removes makeup and buffs away impurities, leaving skin refreshed and radiant. The gel makes removing makeup quick and easy, deeply purifying while helping to minimize pores. It works for all skin types and won‚Äôt leave any tightness or residue.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"S.N.","review":"I've been a dedicated user of Clinique's Acne Solutions liquid foundation for years, with the idea that "Acne Solutions" meant that it was the only foundation I could possibly ever use without turning into a zit-monster. The problem is that I have an unhappy combination of flaky-dry skin and deeply oily patches--Clinique's foundation worked okay on the oily bits but was ruinous on the flaky sections, and was actually so impossible that I spent the better part of two years mixing it with my daily moisturizer just to make it workable. (Should have been a red flag, I know, I know.)

I switched to L'Oreal's Lumi foundation thinking I could just return it if it turned out to be truly awful, and if it did work, it was far (far, far) cheaper than Clinique, which would make my pocket book happy. I'm glad I did, too, because this stuff is wonderful. It glides onto my skin, blends beautifully, and works with my dry patches instead of against them. I do get a bit oilier in the evenings than I did before, but that's because this isn't an anti-shine foundation, so finishing powder is a must, but that's a molehill compared to the mountain that was I'm Not Shedding My Skin Like A Snake I Swear.

Not only is this cheaper than my former go-to foundation, but I use far less of it (only one squirt!) and though I've been at it for a month I've barely put a dent in the bottle. And, I'm happy to say, my skin--which is ultra-sensitive and likes to take revenge for things like resting my chin in my hands--didn't react at all. There wasn't even a slight increase in breakouts after the switch and, if anything, my skin evened out more. And true to the name, it really does give you a clean, bright face, a perfect base for whatever look you're going for--and excellent if you're the "no-make-up make up" sort, as this stuff is all but invisible when blended with a big foundation brush.

All-in-all, a really great product--would have gotten 5 stars if I didn't have the Oily Afternoon Syndrome, but that's life!","rating":"4.0","source":"Amazon"}{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer","review":"Sometimes buying makeup on Amazon is dicey, but this foundation has come over and over in pristine condition, no separating, same consistency as in store, but I get a little discount using subscribe and save. I like this foundation in general for a light and buildable base, and it is not drying for my combination skin. Once in a while, it will separate on my skin a little if I get too sweaty, but this is as expected for me.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"dog mom","review":"not too matte.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"}]
