reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"MB", "review":"I love this product for fighting wrinkles, but it is so harsh.  I have sensitive/dry skin (which of course, shows wrinkles the most) and being of "that certain age,"  my skin is extra dry and sensitive.  I used this religiously, but ended up with my eyes almost sealed shut from a reaction to it and my skin burned, even when I limited my use to once or twice a week.  Got rid of the wrinkles, but also got rid of my skin!!  I won't give up using it, because it is amazing on wrinkles, but I recommend not using it every night - use it a couple of nights on, then a couple of nights off.  My face would be red after using it this way, but not burned.  A friend of mine recommended another skin care product - she's into organic - and told me to try Bel Essence (comes in an oil or cream, I used both - I've been buying it from their website but it's available here too)(","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Donna Rae Hansford", "review":").  This solved the reaction problem to Roc.  Not only did it help my skin in general, but using it with Roc - no burning, no bad reactions.  I talked to my doctor about it, and he told me that the natural oils in Bel Essence contain high amounts of Vitamin E and other nutrients that help the skin heal and stay healthy.  If you love Roc (and I am a HUGE fan), I recommend using Bel Essence with it, to get the good effects of Roc without the bad.  There are a lot of all natural skin creams out there, but this worked the best, and absolutely worked the best with Roc.  Not only does it keep the results from the retinol permanent, my skin kept getting better - lines and discolorations were still going away even when I reduced the number of times I used the retinol.  I swear by both products.\nQuick update - for Roc burns, I found that the Bel Essence oil","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Victoria", "review":"This deep wrinkle cream from Roc really works. I have been using it for a month now and I can see a marked difference in my deeper lines. They aren't as deep and look softer. This sometimes stings a little around the eye. I figure it stings a little because it has potent ingredients and it's working! Roc is a really good product. I use the moisturizer in the gold jar, and it is really good. Your skin will just drink it.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews[0].review: Makes my face feel smooth!
reviews[1].review: I originally received this Clay Mask from L'Oreal for free as part of their campaign to bring word of mouth awareness to the product.  But after using it for a month, I ended up purchasing another set after going through half the bottle.  Since I received and also purchased three different types of Clay Mask which had different purposes, my review will be in three part.  Bear in mind that I would probably rate my skin as about normal with a slight tendency to oily on occasion.
reviews[2].review: I recommend this product and all the Loreal clay masks and scrubs. It doesn't dry my face out, it doesn't make me break out, and it doesn't give me chemical burns (which I can easily get because of overly sensitive skin). When I use these masks, my face feels very clean and soft afterward. Now, I do recommend that if you are thinking about buying one of these, just buy any clay mask and one scrub. You don't need to buy all of them. I know they all claim to help in different ways, but they all have similar results. Well-worth results, but similar. I would buy the one whose result claim is closer to what you're looking for. I also enjoyed that you don't have to keep the clay masks for son long, just 10 to 15 minutes. The masks will last you quite some time and value to it price. The product itself is creamy to put on. It dries up after 10 minutes and you rinse it off. Your face looks smoother, pores less visible, cleaner, less red, and even acne looks better. I recommend giving it a try.

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Mo","review":"This is generally what happens when people switch facial cleansers, it breaks them out. There are a few cleansers that don't do this, while the rest of them (generally the new products) do this. I was running out of the Purpose Gentle Cleansing Wash, which was my preferred facial cleanser, then I went to Amazon to order another 12oz bottle, and then I discovered Amazon's horrible "add-on" program. I wrote about the various negative features of the add-on program and how I felt about it, on Amazon's forum, so I won't mention it in detail here. Nevertheless, I went to Walgreens to look for the 12oz bottle and found that the price at Walgreens for a 6oz bottle was higher than what I'd even paid for a 12oz one here on Amazon months ago (before the add-on program and it was around $6). So I seen this product on sale at Walgreens for a little over $6 and bought it. The product had a label on it that specified that it was for "all skin types," and that it "won't dry (the) out skin," but the thing that won me over was on the back where it says, "suitable for sensitive eyes." Most cleansers burn the eyes when it gets too close, this one doesn't. And for that and the fact that it cleans my skin, I gave it a decent/average rating. Unfortunately, after having only used it for about four days, it also broke me out, more than once and in numerous places on my face. The Purpose face wash didn't do that. It only did it when I wasn't washing my face with it twice a day. This one I washed my face twice and I still broke out. This is the reason why I gave it 3 out of 5 stars.\n\nLet me clarify something for the Amazon community. Generally when I read 3-star reviews of the different products on Amazon, the writers who write them, write pessimistic reviews and discourage the potential customers reading their reviews from purchasing the product or item that they gave a 3-star rating for. A 3-star rating is actually a decent/average rating. Yes, it's neither a 4-star "good" rating, nor a 5-star "great" rating, but it's still above a 2-star "below average" rating, and a one-star "horrible" product rating. Decent/Average is still acceptable. It seems like people on Amazon don't know how to rate products. This is a 3-star decent/average product. It does get the job done in washing your face, it doesn't dry out your skin and it is gentle enough to wash the skin under your eyes (where the dark circles may be), but again, it did break me out more than once and in multiple places. This is a decent/average product overall. Would I purchase this again? If I can get my hands on a Purpose bottle for a reasonable price, then probably not, but I'm not going to discourage people from purchasing this because it's not a bad product, it's acceptable.","rating":"3.0","source":"Amazon"}{"reviewer_name":"Jodi","review":"This product is amazing! makes my face look so wonderful.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"nancy","review":"I love this product. It gives my face a natural rosy look and the bonus is the sunscreen in the moisturizer.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"}]

brand[0].review: Great moisturizer that is non greasy with slight pleasant smell. Leaves my skin so soft. Very happy with purchase.
brand[1].review: I like the feel of this lotion as a moisturizer during the dry days of winter, especially if I am not wearing makeup that day.  This lotion is thicker than most day lotions I have used on my face.  The scent is a little exotic but not bad to my scent-sensitive skin and sense of smell. Problem is it is so thick that it feels like my face has a thick layer over it and it makes my skin bead with sweat easier.  I can't stand to wear makeup over it, since the makeup seems to just float on top of the lotion layer and looks terrible.  Add summer heat and humidity and it makes me feel even hotter.  The day cream of this lotion isn't as bad as the night in regards to the heaviness, but both are not good for hot and humid weather days, especially if you use makeup.  My face just constantly feels slicked with a thick film at all times using this product.  I will be keeping mine for dry air winter months, but for summer it just isn't working out.
brand[2].review: Love the product but won't order online anymore

PREMIUM GLASS JAR: With its sleek, modern design and gold finishes, this moisturizer is the perfect addition to any skin care collection. Made from recycled and recyclable glass material, it‚Äôs beautiful for you, as well as the planet.

reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Johann Arroyo Arce", "review":"Yes, as you read it: you should have this on hand in case of emergencies.\nI bought it for my face and it turned out to be a hit on my skin. One day while I was playing with one of my cats he scratched my face and hand. I immediately ran to the bathroom to wash the entire affected area (I have problems healing and my skin is very sensitive for this reason the "drama") and instead of applying any medicine I decided to put the serum on. I did not feel any discomfort, not the typical itch that I get every time my cats scratch me, the skin did not swell and I did not present more redness than normal. The wound stopped bleeding (which is often difficult for me) and after three days (I applied it three times a day) I could see the wound begin to fade into my skin. After a week the skin was completely healthy and to date: you cannot see where the accident happened.\nMy first bottle is completely empty but I already have another to continue using this wonderful product.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Johann Arroyo Arce", "review":"Super product. Absorbs well and no stickiness afterwards. Leave your skin more hydrated. There is no fragrance, which is hard to find these days but a blessing when you do find it, for those with sensitive skin and allergies.  I honestly can‚Äôt tell there is a big difference between the collagen and hydration, but both definitely do hydrate. One bottle, used twice a day, about 5 drops each time, lasts me a little over a month. It will probably go longer if you use less but the older you get, the more you tend to slather on a good product. Lol, since it says collagen, I do use that one at night and hydration in the day. I know the collagen production decreases with age, especially after 40, BUT a small part of me want to think it helps a tiny bit. :) Cant Hurt.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Mochi", "review":"It is moisturizing but didn‚Äôt help with whitening the dark spots like it was advertising. brand[1].review: 1st of all i am not at all new to using primer i am a pt working makeup artist i just f makeup on the side for extra income and have been so for 7 years now i did however hv a massive stroke 2 years ag. Oyehich aged my skin by a good 20 years ouch so i did have to change my own mackeup routine a bit as now i hv wrinkles and loose skin in the eye area so i decided to try diffrent primers and foundations before i used the clear mineral primer by elf which is super cheap and that works AMAZING kept my makeup looking fresh and perfect FOR DAYS yes ladies i said days i am such a perfectionest w my makeup i would sit at my vanity sometimes for 2 hours to do a full face cuz i wouldnt be done till EVERYTHING WAS PERFECT N IF I MESSED SOMETHING UP I WLD WIPE IT ALL OFF N START OVERwow now to get to the review i told u all this cuz i know times people read reviews spacificlly bad reviews n think they just didnt use it rite let me assure u i know very well how to apply primer and this primer was no good did nothing for wrinkles and had no staying power it didnt keep my foundation looking good even for 3 hours let alone the entire day! After only a couple hours my foundation contour n everything was faded so badly i had to totally reapply using my elf primer which i can apply n wear it all day and sleep in my makeup and i hv worn it again the entire next day and it still looks fresh like i had just done it i recomend the elf primers over even some highend primers they hv a whole line of primers from the clear mineral which keeps my very oily skin matte for days whithout drying me out to moisurizing one for dry skin and one for minumizing pores i hv tried all and they are all wonderful my favorite is the minuralize one cuz it keeps me matte but i hv dry skin n wrinkles under my eyes so i use the moisurizing one under my eyes and they clear minuralize one on the rest my face i do not recomend this loreal primer however there are lots of loreal products that i do love and use everyday on both myself and my clients like the loreal infallible foundations and lipstick n cream eyeliners
brand[2].review: After using your skin feels so clean it tingles!

name: Pure Clay Exfoliating + Smoothing Red Algae Mask
brand:
[{"reviewer_name":"Dionisio","review":"So not sure why I see such mixed reviews and some very negative about this lemon clay mask because I think it's wonderful! Nearly everything by L'oreal is of excellent quality. Yes, the box it came in was a little smushed.
 (I see people mentioning it in other reviews) but overall, the product shipment was good. I
I used it one time & it goes on smoothly.
It has a somewhat pleasant smell, has the necessary grittiness that is great for exfoliating. It didn't feel heavy on my face, it just did its thing like this type of mask should do. When I washed it off, my skin was very smooth looking and feeling. It works! And no there was not any white or sticky residue and it was very easy to wash off. I'm still wondering  why some reviews were negative. Its a nice product & yes, it is worth the money.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Sweet T","review":"I'm pretty new to face masks - I'm just starting my routine and it usually involves a sheet mask that probably does more through the placebo effect than anything else. I wanted to give a real product a try so I did some research and read a lot of reviews and I ended up ordering this. I noticed a difference immediately after the first use, and my skin feels amazing every time I use it. (EDIT: added pics. I've been using this mask about once a week for a few months and these are immediate before/after for my last use. You can notice a smoother texture/complexion as well as cleaner pores. This was after an exfoliating face wash.)

Rating:
I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars mostly because the size of the product is so small. Being new to this stuff, I'm not sure if this kind of size is standard as I could not find a larger version. The rating is also 4/5 because after the first 2 or so uses I haven't seen any other skin improvements. Immediately after every use I can see a change, but no long-term improvements use after use. In other words, I do really like this product and I will probably buy it again, but it was not amazing.

Feel:
This face mask doesn't really exfoliate at all. It's supposed to exfoliate as you wash it off but the bits of rock are so few that it doesn't do much. I use an exfoliating face wash instead and then put this on afterward. I have fairly sensitive and very dry skin, so the mask does tingle a bit but it never gets uncomfortable. Once I wash it off my face does feel fantastic - hydrated, plump, and extremely smooth and clean. I do put some light moisturizer on after as my skin is so dry.

Results:
The first 2 times I used it I noticed an immediate difference that stayed through the next day. Since then it's stayed about the same - it has shrinked and lessened my visible pores as well as clearing out the big ones on my nose. It has also made my skin tone and texture more even throughout, smoothing the overall appearance. However, even with repeated use (about once a week) it has not cleared out those large pores as much as I would've hoped. Considering how much it did the first couple times I expected it to clear them out much more after a few more uses.

My boyfriend tried this mask with me once and he was super into it. He almost never washes his face unless I remind him, and after using this he couldn't stop touching his face for hours. He was amazed at how clear and smooth it was. He's Asian American and has what he calls "Asian grease" - basically he has fairly oily skin. Neither of us have had an negative effects from this product.","rating":"4.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Darkangel1197","review":"I like it because it  is easy to use and after its application your face looks clean and bright.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews[0].review: I am a very fair skinned, older woman who has dry, dull skin and desperately needed some brightening and oomph to my makeup routine. Self tanners look awful and fake on my fair skin. They make my skin look even drier. I heard about Lumi and was skeptical it would make me look too dark or shimmery but it looked amazing and the first time I wore it I got many compliments on how great my makeup was. I applied it over primer and under foundation. My skin looks amazing with it! It looks dewy, hydrated, with a warm glow without looking tan or shiny. It brightens my skin with reflective particles that makes my skin look younger with just a slight shimmer. It blurs lines and pores and adds dimension and a natural glow. I'll never do my makeup without it again and will be trying the light, rosy shade also for a different look for winter. This is seriously amazing stuff, especially for older women with dull skin. It illuminates without that shiny highlighter look. It gives you  natural glow that is worth triple the price. Highly recommend!
reviews[1].review: If you like a moisturizer and cover in one this is it. I use it and it plumps my skin up, it is a nice glam up for going out combined with other makeup applications or it can be worn alone with just lipstick. A little goes a long way. It does have a bit of an iridescent glow, and It‚Äôs in no way a matte application. It securely hides any fine lines.
reviews[2].review: I find most foundations slightly too yellow and slightly too matte - I've tried serum foundations but then there's not enough coverage. I mixed the fair color into my L'Oreal True match and voila! It's perfect. I never want to run out of this stuff! It's great on top of tinted sunscreen, too.

name: Color Riche
description: Discover our new powdery matte lipstick that lasts for up to 16hr. All day matte finish that does not look flat. Infused with hyaluronic acid. Lips feel comfortable and look fuller all day long. New Slim bullet for precise application. Can be used to line your lips for contour or fill your lips with intense matte color. Available in 12 saturated shades that flatter a variety of skin tones. Find your shade today. Color does not smudge, bleed, migrate or feather

reviews[0].review: this was a bery nice soft pink that is just so beautoful, it did also last almost all day!
reviews[1].review: Love the rich color. Long wearing!
reviews[2].review: It really goes on in one swipe, full on color but you have to be careful touching your lips or it will transfer. Been using it for three days and my lips are getting dried out though. I suspect it's this lipstick. But it's a beautiful consistency and makes your lips look smooth!

name: Minerals Powder Mattifying
description: Revlon ColorStay‚Ñ¢ GRIP Matte Primer primes, mattifies, and improves your makeup wear for up to 16 hours. The lightweight, buildable formula grasps onto your makeup without letting go all day. Triple-power action mattifies, controls excess sebum by absorbing oil, reduces the appearance of pores, and blurs imperfections for perfected, flawless matte skin. Infused with a SUPERFOOD DETOX BLEND of Citrus + Aloe + Broccoli that protects skin against the effects of daily aggressors including blue light, environmental stress and pollution by neutralizing free radicals. The formula is non-tacky with a non-drying feel. Free from added parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: I've tried a lot of drugstore and top of the line primers.  This primer is hands down the best!  Affordable, but most importantly, you don't feel it on your face, it goes on like a smooth, very thin gel (not runny at all though).  A little goes a really long way.  I only use it on my 't' zone and eyelids.  It dries really quickly.  After about 3-4 mins, I'm able to apply my tintend sunscreen, concealer touch ups, powder and setting mist and wow, 10 hours later I was amazed, it was as if I'd just applied my make up!  My lipstick was flawless too!  I rarely to my brows, but I tried this on the brows once after treating brows with Anastasia brow gel.  My brows didn't budge a bit.  And everything came off easily and quickly with my simple make up removing cloths by Olay.  So don't hesitate.  This primer will be the last brand you try.
reviews[1].review: I am a special effects makeup artist and I use this to lock the looks in. Works beautifully. Even after a full day of shooting or a 3 hour performance, my creatures and characters look as fresh as they did in the chair.
reviews[2].review: Love the finish it gives wish it was a bigger bottle but still got it for a good price

name: Nutri-Gold, Essential Oil Ritual, Cream-Mask for the Night
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Veronica B", "review":"I really have been enjoying this Mirage Moon Tri-Peptide Hydra Serum!

I have fairly sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions. No scent detected. This Serum is a little thick (but not as thick as a moisturizer), white and milky-like serum.

I use it as soon as I get out of the shower with a freshly cleansed face and it really hydrates my skin! It also really calms and soothes my skin! It also leaves my skin feeling smooth and more ‚Äúplump‚Äù. It really does well with my sensitive skin!

From their listing: ‚Äú The Tri-Peptide Hydra Serum is designed to help improve the appearance of aging skin by boosting collagen production and providing hydration.‚Äù  -  I definitely notice how well it hydrates my skin, it does really well in that area! I have yet to notice any changes to my fine lines and wrinkles, but it‚Äôs still early!

I am excited to continue use and hopefully soon will see some improvement in my fine lines and wrinkles !","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Kali Knauss", "review":"Nice presentation, expensive looking packaging. Contains Ascorbyl Glucoside, which is easy to work with in skincare formulations but is unproven in studies for anti-aging benefits. Other Vitamin C forms are shown to be more effective. In Vitro studies show Ascorbyl Glucoside has similar benefits to pure vitamin C so it does show promise, but again, other forms of Vitamin C are proven in actual human studies. We do know Ascorbyl Glucoside penetrates the skin well, so that's a good start.

This product also includes Ferulic Acid, which is a great ingredient for fading and preventing dark spots. It has very little fragrance and my hypersensitive rosacea prone skin is tolerating it well so far - which is rare! The bottle says it is "Peptide Rich," but I can't easily figure out which peptides are in it because I don't see any of the most common ones listed on the ingredients. I like the Vitamin E ingredient for moisture, and the Emblica extract (Indian Gooseberry plant) for proven anti-oxidant protection. It's a nice thin serum that quickly absorbs into the skin. 2 pumps is enough for you face, add another pump or two for neck and chest. Layers well under other moisturizers and sunblock.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Kali Knauss", "review":"So, my grandmama was right -- when I was young and had flawless skin, she used to always, always tell me to be sure to moisturize my neck.  But did I listen?  Nooooo!  Of course not!

So now, looking in the mirror, when I see my neck, I just get, well, pissed off.  I should have listened to Grandmama!  So I don't know whether my expectations were unrealistic, but I was hoping nightly use of this serum with a good moisturizer over it could tighten or firm things up a bit.  Or just somehow, reduce whatever it is that's going on there.  It does, after all, make that claim in the advertising.  And I know that vitamin C, going directly into the skin, can make a considerable difference.  I've now used almost the entire bottle, and today, finally, looking in the mirror -- I think, finally, I see a little improvement -- I think.

It came packaged very beautifully and professionally.  I was quite impressed.  The bottle makes it look like more than it is -- but it is, in fact, just one ounce.  Obviously, I have not been big on using moisturizing products, so I am certainly no expert in this matter, but the price does seem a bit high to me for the quantity.

I dunno, I guess for the effort of faithfully rubbing this stuff into my neck every night for nearly a month, ( I will say, it does go on easy), then coating that with a moisturizer, I was hoping for just a bit more.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Lumi Glow Amour Boosting Drops
description: Viral TikTok Favorite L'Oreal Paris True Match Lumi Glotion is a luminous tinted moisturizer infused with glycerin and shea butter for instant hydration and a radiant finish. The highlighting formula is lightweight and delivers an illuminating color tint for healthy, glowing skin. Use on face and body. Available in 4 shades.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: I am a very fair skinned, older woman who has dry, dull skin and desperately needed some brightening and oomph to my makeup routine. Self tanners look awful and fake on my fair skin. They make my skin look even drier. I heard about Lumi and was skeptical it would make me look too dark or shimmery but it looked amazing and the first time I wore it I got many compliments on how great my makeup was. I applied it over primer and under foundation. My skin looks amazing with it! It looks dewy, hydrated, with a warm glow without looking tan or shiny. It brightens my skin with reflective particles that makes my skin look younger with just a slight shimmer. It blurs lines and pores and adds dimension and a natural glow. I'll never do my makeup without it again and will be trying the light, rosy shade also for a different look for winter. This is seriously amazing stuff, especially for older women with dull skin. It illuminates without that shiny highlighter look. It gives you  natural glow that is worth triple the price. Highly recommend!
reviews[1].review: If you like a moisturizer and cover in one this is it. I use it and it plumps my skin up, it is a nice glam up for going out combined with other makeup applications or it can be worn alone with just lipstick. A little goes a long way. It does have a bit of an iridescent glow, and It‚Äôs in no way a matte application. It securely hides any fine lines.
reviews[2].review: I find most foundations slightly too yellow and slightly too matte - I've tried serum foundations but then there's not enough coverage. I mixed the fair color into my L'Oreal True match and voila! It's perfect. I never want to run out of this stuff! It's great on top of tinted sunscreen, too.

name: Ideal Clean Artiste 100% Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: I was tired of paying almost $50 for my beloved 3-in-1 melting makeup cleansing balm so looked for a less expensive option.  This has met all my criteria except for it's fragrance.  It's barely there - which I prefer to a strong fragrance.  This works very well removing all my makeup, including waterproof mascara, leaving my face feeling clean, not dried out, and doesn't leave a film behind.  Well worth the $20!
reviews[1].review: I've been a fan of makeup remover balms for awhile. I don't use them to double cleanse. Just the balm and a warm wet cloth to remove my makeup so I need a balm that removes every trace of makeup. Until now Farmacy has been my favorite but this has a silkier texture, works every bit as well, and costs less so it's definitely a keeper!  There's no fragrance added and the scent of the product itself is nice but barely detectable which I like. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate my skin or eyes at all even though it does a great job of removing eye makeup. Truly an excellent product!
reviews[2].review: This product does a great job of removing makeup.  You only need a very small amount to take off regular makeup look.  It leaves your skin very soft.  I‚Äôve purchased this two times because it works so well. It doesn‚Äôt leave a greasy feeling on your face.  I highly recommend this for makeup removal and skin softness.

name: Skin Expertise Dermo-Expertise Skin Toner Liquid
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: This product works great on my sensitive skin. It helps moisturize and lighten my facial skin and the effect lasts for a day, no discomfort at all. The best toner I‚Äôve ever had
reviews[1].review: I LOVE this product for my fave and neck.  It doesn‚Äôt leave my skin feeling greasy.  My makeup goes on so much smoother. A+
reviews[2].review: Nice toner! It‚Äôs very soothing especially in the summer. Absorbs quickly and is very lightweight. My kids love to use it too after a plane ride or day in the sun. I love this brand but it does go bad fairly quickly once you‚Äôve opened the bottle, so I would recommend slathering it on generously. At this price it‚Äôs quite affordable.

name: Sublime Sun Advanced Sunscreen Crystal Clear Mist, SPF 50
description: Biosolis Sun Spray SPF 30 consist of a light and milky texture. The spray provides a high natural protection thanks to its mineral filters which protect from harmful rays once applied. It has been formulated with vegetable oils known for their moisturizing properties. Its natural fragrance is sweet and leaves a light sunny note of Tiare flower.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Valosia Omega", "review":"This seems to me to be a good alternative to other sunscreens. The first thing I did, was an allergy test.. so I sprayed on both my daughters and my arm so make sure  we were not allergic before really using, everything seemed fine and ready to go.

Next was that we needed to go out into the sun for the day, so we put it on and we went out into the mountains for the 4th of July (we were not in the shade either). It was extremely not and we were afraid of being sunburned, so we are glad we had this..

  I honestly believe, because we were in direct sunlight and during the hottest hours of the day that this sunscreen helped a great deal!!!!! I am honestly not used to wearing sunscreen and all so usually if we go put into the sun we are horribily sunburned. (Which is why my daughter and I are always inside, we do not want to deal with sunburned plus we normally can't deal with the bright sun-light either...).

It wasn't greasy and I like that it is a spray on. It is only SPF 30, but it is NOT
Water-Proof.. so I would definitely say for you to "stay away from water" and reapply if you are ü•µ sweating..

 Reapply:
  After 2 Hours
  After Swimming / Drying Off

  Now, as for the smell of the product
  it is not bad but it is not all that great either, the smell isn't that strong and it doesn't seem to last for long (I forgot to note it when I tested it so I am testing the scent ad I write this and a couple mins after spraying the sunscreen, I can't really smell the sunscreen at all anymore!).

 ‚Ä¢ This Sunscreen,
 I would say is Perfect you if you are Vegan, or if you know someone who is Vegan, this would make a Great Sunscreen Alternative for them!

My daughter and I are Pleased with the Product, we May not be Vegans Ourselves but We Deeply Respect those who are!

‚Ä¢ This worked for is and we are pleased with the functionality of the product!","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"M&M", "review":"We keep this in our diaper bag to use at outdoor events in the summer. It is easy to use when you need to quickly reapply sunscreen. The container doesnt leak and is easy to use. We tend to try and only buy mineral based sunscreen and are really happy with this one.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"CaliGirlShops", "review":"I was hoping this would be a winner for me since it‚Äôs vegan and used cleaner ingredients but it wasn‚Äôt. This sunscreen is 30 spf which I knew going into it and was ready to reapply. However i feel like even applying every 2-3 hours was not quite enough and I felt a tad sunburned after. It was a hot day and I was sweating quite a bit but that is expected if out in the sun. This may be better for everyday use rather than long days of outdoor adventures.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Sublime Sun Advanced Sunscreen, SPF 50
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Brittany", "review":"Now I can protect my skin outside, especially since I live by the beach.  This product blends so nicely into my skin and leaves my skin glowing and healthy looking.  It isn‚Äôt greasy or thick feeling.  This was important to me as i've tried so many sunscreens that make me look oily or dry out my skin. This sunscreen does the opposite!

This product will definitely make wearing sunscreen every day doable.  100% recommend this SPF 50, enjoy!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Brittany", "review":"Not too shabby!  Light-Medium tint disappears on my fair, cool skin. Lightly moisturizing, light dewy finish. Very light weight feel. A light scent, but doesn't smell like "sunscreen". SPF 50 with moisturizing properties, as well as other skin nourishing ingredients. Some tinted sunscreens look weird, but this all blends into skin. Not my favorite, but I will use it up.

I wear sunscreen daily. It is my #1 skin care must have. I usually have a more involved skin care routine, but on days that I want to keep it simple (or entirely forgo it), I still make sure to slather on sunscreen. When I know that I am going to be skipping other skin care products (usually most of summer, as I will sweat it off anyway), I look for a SPF product that can pull double duty as a good moisturizer. Bonus if it has other skin nourishing ingredients.

This formula claims to be DEVELOPED WITH INGREDIENTS TO HELP:
- Provide All Natural broad spectrum UVA/UVB SPF50 Protection.
- Act as both a moisturizer and makeup primer
- Protect against UV induced skin damage
- Visibly improve skin firmness
- Visibly deduce the appearance of pores
- Visibly reduce the appearance of redness and visibly evens skin tone.

I figured it was worth the try. I am familiar with (and not really a fan of) Karyng products, but I had to try this sunscreen. I have the "Light/Medium" tint. It is a tint to reduce white case from the mineral ingredients that serve to block UV rays. It is not a concealer, it is not make up. But if you dont wear make up normally, it will initially appear to be a sheer wash of tint. But then it absorbs and really leaves no tint behind. I have fair skin with cool undertones, and if it were any darker then it wouldnt work, but overall it just disappears.

Active Ingredients:
Titanium Dioxide 5.75% Zinc Oxide 14.00% Iron Oxides  (protects against visible light rays)

Other Key ingredients as per their web page:
--ProVerte‚Ñ¢ Complex ‚Äì A patented natural anti-inflammatory complex combined with the latest innovations in skincare to help repair and restructure skin

--Echinacea Purpurea Extract ‚Äì Strong antioxidant properties to help skin

--Coconut Oil ‚Äì High in saturated fats, helps provides deep and long lasting moisture

--Glycerin - is a skin-identical and skin-repairing ingredient, meaning it is a substance found naturally in skin to help moisturize and prevent dryness

--Lecithin ‚Äì A natural emollient and water-binding agent.

--With regards to sunscreen the average particle size is about 2.5¬µm, with no particles <300nm
___________________________________________________

MY SKIN: mid 40s, clear, smooth, DRY, minimal to no lines, but I do have redness from Type 1 Rosacea (redness & visible veins, NO acne, no bumps).

This Karyng "Complete Moisturizer SPF 50 Sunscreen" goes on feeling a little dry, but then it just sort of melts into the skin. My skin DOES feel lightly moisturized and lightly dewy (I love dewy). My skin is still pink (most of my redness is on cheeks), but it is toned down- less purple red, and more of a healthy pinky flush. Red of face is evened out further. The minerals in this is what helps create this effect. The tint is just to keep it from having a white cast.

I use it on clean bare skin. My issue with Karyng products in the past is that they tend to roll/pill on me when used with other products even with a long period of time in between layers, and even with like products (ie water based and water based). My initial experience with this was unfavorable. I had lightly washed my face. Got dressed, then applied this sunscreen. While my face was not wet, it may have been moist enough to react with this sunscreen, as it started rolling. ARGH. This is water based, so there is no need for that. So then I went about my day, and a couple of hours later I added more. Figured, this is what I would normally do, so mind as well see how it does. It did not exacerbate the rolling/pilling. It seemed fine. So while l likely wont be using this directly after washing my face (BOO), and I wont be pairing it with other products (also BOO), I will still use it. Your experience may vary. I haven't tried this under make up (I rarely wear make up0), but when I do I may report back on my experience.

Ingredients are listed on box, but not listed here nor on their website. I'll try to get a good picture of the box.

Generous, early impression 4 stars","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Precise Disarray", "review":"love this product! very light on the face. Breathable and does not break my face out.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews[1].review: It is light, smells great and goes on smooth!  However, it is too early to see the results. I've only used it a few days.
reviews[2].review: So disappointed. I‚Äôve used their evening rich moisturizer before and have continuously used and it‚Äôs provided great hydration for my skin. I noticed their packaging/design changed & hoped that was all that changed but unfortunately, their ingredients list did as well. I do not have sensitive skin and this caused dryness and even made me break out. Oh and did I mention the super potent/chemical-like smell? So sad about this. I want old Devita evening moisturizer back ! I would‚Äôve stocked up if I knew it would change.

name: White Perfect Total Recover Sleeping Mask

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"KMK", "review":"Meebak Review.

I recently tried two products. Their Cica Brightening Age-Repair Face Serum, and their Cica Cream Age-Repair Moisturizer. These are Korean beauty products. I have used these for two weeks straight. My first impressions are they feel like silk. At first, I thought the moisturizer would be too heavy for day time use, but I was using too much and a little goes a long way, it absorbs beautifully, and does not feel heavy at all. These products are sold on Amazon and have a great price point, but they easily compete with high end beauty products. My skin looks and feels amazing. Both products have almost 5 star reviews on Amazon.

Meebak is the brand where Asian Beauty Rituals meet K-Beauty Technology.
They combine traditional herbal remedies with modern science to craft products uniquely made for women‚Äôs sensitive skin.
The natural ingredients used to create Their special CICA Care formula have been used for thousands of years to calm and soothe even the most troubled skin.
All of their products will help your skin radiate with a healthy glow, restoring its natural beauty and they are cruelty free.

The Cica Serum is $19.97. It soothes, and helps to rebuild the skin barrier to heal irritated skin with Centella asiatica. The light and silky texture is compatible with all skin types.
The super calming anti-aging serum is formulated with the healing power of Centella asiatica and madecassoside to strengthen the skin barrier, soothing irritated skin. Rebuilds and regenerates the skin barrier with ceramide and adenosine.
Hydrates your moisture barrier with Hyaluronic acid and saccharomyces fermentate.
And retouches your skin texture with Niacinamide and corrects your wrinkles and fine lines with retinol.

The Cica Cream is $14.97. It soothes and rebuilds the skin barrier to heal irritated skin with Centella asiatica. The light and silky texture is compatible with all skin types. No Animal Testing. No Sulphates. No Phthalates. No Parabens. This super calming anti-aging cream is formulated with the healing power of Centella asiatica and madecassoside to strengthen the skin barrier, soothing irritated skin. It rebuilds and regenerates the skin barrier with ceramide and adenosine.  It consistently hydrates your moisture barrier with Hyaluronic acid and ceramide.  It retouches your skin texture with Niacinamide and corrects your wrinkles and fine lines with retinol. Nice Job Meebak,","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"KMK", "review":"I've been using this Cica cream for a few years now, and it's been a game-changer for my dry and sensitive skin. Not only is the texture super smooth and non-greasy, but it also has a nice subtle scent. I've had no issues with redness or breakouts since I started using it. It deeply hydrates and rejuvenates my skin, leaving it radiant and supple. I even use it as a fantastic pre-makeup moisturizer for a flawless finish. Morning and night, this cream has transformed my skin, giving me the confidence I've been looking for. I can't recommend it enough.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"rhythmrider", "review":"I ‚ù§Ô∏è this product. I like the smell when I first open the lid.  I tried both the serum and the cream moisturizer.  I love the texture of the both product.  It is very moist and definitely feel the hydration, especially love it for my dry skin.
I applied the product at night, I wake up with soft, moist, and hydrated skin. I do feel that product absorbs into my skin.  Let me just say that this product owns up to every word it says.  Also it has a fantastic feel to it and a light, pleasantly refreshing scent.

I love the product that is known to help skin look brighter, reduce discoloration, and erase visible signs of aging, which I need the most. Another thing I want to try this product is it was made with all natural ingredient, without animal testing.

I hope The product comes with a small spoon or spatula. I do like using the spatula to grab the product. I feel like I‚Äôm not contaminating the product with my fingers. The jar that the product comes in doesn‚Äôt seem heavy but when I add all the other products together in a bag, it‚Äôs the heaviest or one of the heaviest skin products I own.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews[0].review: This goes on smoothly without clumping if used over a thin layer of eye cream that was allowed to soak into skin earlier.  It's a good skin match for my fair complexion that has a slight golden undertone. Great price. Blends well with foundation. I really like it.
reviews[1].review: This concealer is very creamy.  It is sheer with good coverage.  It does not budge during the work day and its easy to touch up if needed.
reviews[2].review: Works on covering age spots and circles under the eye better than more expensive brands I've purchased.  (Sorry no pics - haha)  I started using Cover Girl products about 50 years ago.....never disappointed.

name: Advanced Suncare Silky Sheer Lotion SPF 50+
description: L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen is an anti-aging face moisturizer formulated with 3 of the top derm-recommended ingredients: Pro-Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C to reduce wrinkles, firm and brighten skin in 1 week. After use skin feels smoother, softer, refreshed. Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin. Paraben free, mineral oil free, Dye Free, allergy tested. Layers well under makeup.

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Kat", "review":"This by far is my favorite anti wrinkle cream I have tried several, some can be hard on the skin. This one does not bother my sensitive skin. It has a light fragrance. You can definitely see a difference after using it for a few weeks. I‚Äôve used it for a few years. It decreases the look of wrinkles, make your skin smooth, and soft. This lotion completely absorbs into your skin so your skin is not sticky or wet feeling.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Sydney", "review":"I've repurchased this face cream a million times and I will continue to buy it. This face cream is very rich and moisturizing. It leaves my face feeling super hydrated and soft.  It also looks fabulous under makeup aswell.

The only reason i didn't give this cream 5 stars was because of how much product you get in the bottle. It lasts me about 2 1/2 months at the most. I wish Loreal came out with a larger version of this face cream because you do go through it fast it you wear it morning and night. I also wish this face cream had SPF in it. I do not believe it does.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Ms.Maria", "review":"This has always been my favorite Loreal skin creme. I did take a chance and ordered several new products but the face cremes left my face feeling very tacky & greassy all day long not to mention the REVITALIFT Burned my eyes terribly.  I've always been happy w this product though. For night time for morning for under make up this is my go too.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Selena", "review":"This cream is all I have been using for a long time. I tried to use others because this cost so much but they did not do the job. I am 80 years old and people always stare at me in disbelief when I tell them because I don't have any wrinkles. Recently I told two women who were in their late 60s about it.  This revitalized your skin like no other moisturizer I have ever used.  It costs a lot and you have to use a small amount for it to last but it is worth every penny!  I will stay on it forever.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Shawn Nichols", "review":"So the product is really nice when I use it at night and when I pair it with a hyaluronic acid serum but it can leave my face looking Shiney for a LONG time, which is okay at night. Now during the day it's a different story. I have really bad skin texture but my face gets drier now that I'm almost 30. If I just use this product by itself during the day, it leaves my skin looking Shiney and feeling greasy even after a few hours; and that can really make texture/ scares on the skin much more noticeable especially during a sunny day.

My recommendation is that it would be best to use this product, if you have bad skin texture like I do, only at night or days when you're home by yourself; Use a water based gel moisturizer for the day.

Now for its results. It helped with some fine lines I was getting under my right eye, but I also added a 1% retinol to my routine. Keep in mind that this SHOULD ( from what I've read online) have .03% retinol in it.

In conclusion; I recommend this for nighttime but I would probably pare it with a hyaluronic acid serum and a retinol ( 1-3 times nightly a week).","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"CINDY MANJOUNES", "review":"Product is great and not greasy. Really helped firm up my neck and make the wrinkles disappear. Would highly recommend very good value for the price.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Youth Code Skin Recharger Day/Night Cream Moisturizer
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Jiwon Lee", "review":"I think I am getting youger. Dermafirm products make youger look, I gaurentee. I have used the prodcuts more than 10 years. When I compare my pics from 10 years (Google saved all my pics so I could find one). I think I look younger now. I am 45 years old and do not really take care of my skin much. I have just used basic skincare itmes from Dermafirm. I recommend this cream to anyone who are dry skin or a bit trouble skin (My mom and I both use this. My mom loves it too). I only use toner, aloe vera gel, essence, and this cream everyday. Try this product. You never regret. Now I know how natural products affect our skin. Use this and make your skin younger. I took the first pic right now for this review. I hope these pics will help you to see how my skin looks and wrinkles are.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"MKEG 79", "review":"This moisturizer does not leave my skin feeling moist or sticky.  My skin really absorbs it so much so that I wonder if I even put any on.  I do notice a tightness and overall clean sensation when I apply it, so I assume it's doing something right.  My face feels soft and smooth.  I apply it in the morning and at night.  I'm not certain this is worth the price point unless you really hate the feeling of lotion on your face.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Luke Bee", "review":"I live in an area that has almost no humidity year round, so while I'd say my skin is very used to this and it is usually not an issue there are still times where I need something for dry skin. Something for the face is always tricky (at least for me), as I don't want something that is heavy and going to cause me to break out, and I am a guy and would prefer something that isn't heavily scented (and more often than not smelling of perfume or other "feminine-leaning" scents as most others are). This is perfect on both fronts as there is no scent, and a little really goes a long way to moisturize but it's very very light feeling. Again, I am a guy and I've not purchased lots of different creams and moisturizers and am wary of spending a lot on a moisturizer/lotion. This does work well though, and is better than nearly everything else I've tried in the past. This doesn't cause my skin to break out, and doesn't feel like there is something on my face/skin but does help a lot with dry skin when I need it. Additionally, while this isn't specific to this moisturizer I do like seeing high-quality products from other countries as it can sometimes seem that EVERYTHING is coming from one country/area only. Highly recommended if you want something that has no scent, and that really works well to moisturize without having to use very much of the product!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"JK", "review":"This is a thick cream and applies easily and smoothly. It soaks in quickly and absorbs fully without leaving any kind of tacky or greasy residue behind which I really appreciate. Unfortunately it just wasn't quite moisturizing enough for my skin. I good moisturizer will plump and smooth out the fine lines around my eyes but this one didn't do that for me. I also think it's pricey at it's current price of $40, even with the current 20% off promo that would make it $32, considering one of my favorite (healthy ingredient) moisturizers is only $18.","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"On Eagles Wings", "review":"I really like this moisturizer.  I received it on Sunday and I thought I would give it a full week before submitting a review.  But, after 5 days I can definitely see and feel a noticeable difference.  My skin gets very dry and cracked during the winter and this year seems to be terrible.  I decided to try this because it said it doesn't contain any fragrances or artificial colors or preservatives.  My skin is easily irritated too from some of the ingredients within many of the other lotions.

This lotion comes packaged very nice and looks well made.  There is an inner seal in the jar and the lotion itself just looks exquisite, not cheap.  It feels nice and definitely not oily, just rich moisture.  I started using it the day I received it and within 3 days my dry, cracked skin didn't have the red, dry, itchy feel and the cracks had healed.  In 2 more days I noticed that the moisture and softness to my face and hands had returned.

I feel this is an excellent moisturizer for very dry and cracked skin that is sensitive to chemicals and fragrances.  The cost seems a little high compared to what I normally used.  But, this worked faster and better.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Sandra", "review":"This moisturizer is lightweight, but very effective for dry skin. Quickly absorbs into skin, non-greasy, works well under makeup. Great price for a high quality product.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Papaya", "review":"This review is for DERMAFIRM Ultra Soothing Hydra Cream R4 50ml / 1.69 Fl oz

When I read the ingredients I was surprised there was olive oil in this product. I wasn't expecting that. Unfortunately sometimes for people with acne, olive oil is not so good because it was aggravate acne because it doesn't absorb well into the pores. On the bright side it is close to halfway down the ingredient list so hopefully there isn't enough to aggravate those with acne. This product has a few silicones in it so I wasn't expecting a heavily moisturizing cream and in fact this is more on the lightweight side. What this product does is it creates a nice base for makeup. Not my favorite moisturizer, but okay for day time before I put on makeup since I do not prefer to use silicone based skincare at night time or when I do not have makeup on.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"MrsPebbles", "review":"It takes surprisingly little to cover my face and neck and spreads so easily. I really like how my face feels. Hydrated, dewy, not at all greasy. No scent, thankfully. It's usually difficult to tell if beauty products work, but I actually feel like my skin is improved after just 2 weeks! I have mild rosacea and freckles, but since using this, my skin tone is without a doubt more even. Redness basically gone, dry flakes gone (dryness had returned because I ran out of collagen/hyaluronic capsules). And one more thing. I've been using an eye cream that's supposed to get rid of dark under eye circles and it was doing a decent job but not 100%. I used a combo of this cream and that one and the circles completely disappeared. !! I've had them for decades! I tend to doubt myself, wondering whether results are real or imagined but not in this case. They're real because I actually left the house with NO concealer the other day! That's not something I ever do!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Hydra-Total 5 Gel Cleanser
description: Visible Results That BEAT the #1 luxury serum*! Elevated benefits beyond wrinkle relief and hydration. Our Olay Super Serum contains 5 Serum Benefits in One: 1. Better Skin Texture 2. More Even-Looking Skin Tone 3. Firmer Feeling Skin 4. Smoother Visible Lines 5. reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Whitney S.", "review":"I have oily/acne prone skin, but I sometimes get some dry patches during the winter months from using my Proactiv. I had read about this and seen some ads, so I ordered it. Really glad I did! Been using it for a few weeks now, and my skin is smoother and feels good. I was hesitant to try it under makeup, but it didn't make it any oilier than usual, so pleasantly surprised by that. It absorbs quickly and leaves a powdery finish; a little goes a long way.  So far, really happy with it as it moisturizes and keeps skin smooth and clear. Great product and I'd highly recommend it!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Liz", "review":"First off, the look of the product is so pretty and has a soft pleasant smell. I‚Äôve been using this for a few weeks now. I have mature skin (I‚Äôm in my 40‚Äôs) and my face/skin has been feeling so smooth and taut. It didn‚Äôt break me out or anything. After applying and letting it dry on my face, I finish it off with face cream/moisturizer. My complexion has been looking flawless!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"HEW", "review":"I‚Äôve only been using a few days and I can already tell a difference in my skin tone and my skin is softer. This isn‚Äôt like the other Olay serums I‚Äôve tried in the past that are thicker- It‚Äôs light but it still works good. It does have a weird smell- Another person posted it smelled like tobacco and I have to agree that‚Äôs what it smells like. It‚Äôs not horrible- just odd.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Bella M", "review":"I love that this serum combines all the anti-aging ingredients into one albeit small bottle. I don't need to go buy 5 separate products. I have sensitive skin that reacts pretty quickly to irritants and this serum is fine for me to use daily, sometimes twice a day morning and night. It is affordable considering all the active ingredients you get in one product, you can easily spend upwards to $100 if you were to go out and buy these products separately. The fragrance is very mild and pleasant, no oily residue on the face, and lies very well underneath primer or makeup.\n\nI saw a few reviews mention people not knowing about the skin sensitivity or sunburn warning on this serum, but that is to be expected with any skincare product that contains AHA (alpha hydroxy acid). This product clearly states all the active ingredients contained inside. When all of these actives are combined into one bottle, any skin sensitivity or irritation will be magnified. If you have sensitive skin, you should not be using this product everyday to start out. Start using it once a week and then build up to more days as your skin becomes used to the product. As for the sunburn warning, you should already apply sunscreen everyday no matter what the weather is or if you "see" the sun.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"MFung", "review":"it you are looking for a serum what does a little bit of everything, this will do the trick. It has vitamin C for antioxidant, it's moisturizing, and has some AHA for clear skin.  This does have a fragrance (reminded me of lavender) which I'm still not sure about.  Don't think I will be buying a another bottle, as I need a more targeted serum.","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Mahera qadir", "review":"This serum was very lightweight and absorbent. The serum did not have a sticky after effect. This also worked marvels on my sensitive skin as I saw results in one to two days after usage","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Judy Kay Linn", "review":"I don't use Olay products as a rule but I tried this anyway.  After using it for a couple of weeks I am impressed.  My skin looks and feels great. It's not pricy, works great and is so pretty. Will buy again.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Alice Bipat", "review":"I am very happy with the quality, smell and moisturizing‚Ä¶.I thought I was getting 2 bottles so I only gave it 4 stars.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Bi-Phase Micellar Water
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Kia Couture", "review":"I wasn't all the way in when I ordered this but now that I've tried it I can't imagine myself going back to liquid makeup remover. If you've tried makeup removing balms and didn't like the stif clay consistency and you're not a fan of micellar water because of the waste of makeup pads this is a perfect middle ground.
I went to an event and had a full beat on with lashes and brows and lip-stain and contour and everything else and I put two or three pumps of this on my fingers and rubbed it into my face and my makeup came off everywhere; brows, lips, face, eyes, everything. I used a towel to take it off and while it does say you can go with just doing that I still washed my face and I was really surprised that hardly anything at all was left over.

By far my new favorite makeup remover and the second I run low I'm ordering another bottle, it's better than anything else I've used int he past 5 years and that includes anything by tatcha","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Y", "review":"This is horrible to use as a first cleanser. It barely took my make up off and gave me an allergic reaction. My top eyelid is swollen. If you are looking to use something to actually take off your make up try Clinique take the day off cleansing balm.","rating":"1.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"ValOfFrance", "review":"Bottle is on the small size for the price. Like the cooling feeling. Goes in fast. Leaves the skin soft. Not the best at cleaning of its kind.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Jill-Elizabeth (Jill Franclemont)", "review":"Ustawi Myrtle Leaf Micellar Water Makeup Remover gel - Vegan, Ethical, Cruelty Free, Clean Beauty for Melanin Rich Skin - 6.7 oz (200 ml)

I am a bit confused - this is billed as makeup remover gel, but the instructions on the bottle say not to get it near your eyes... It works very well as a general facial cleanser. It is gentle and does leave my skin very soft. But I wanted it as an all-in-one makeup remover and cleanser, and if I cannot get it near my eyes, that isn't really possible...","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"RockyRoad", "review":"When you're in a hurry, or just don't feel like taking a lot of time to wash your face, you can't beat the convenience of this cleansing water.
Myrtle helps to soothe and heal skin, and using a good cotton pad soaked with the solution can really take off grime and even oily makeup. Sometimes I'll go over it a second time if I've been wearing a lot of makeup.
Also good to take with you in situations where you don't have a lot of access to water. For example, freshening up on an airplane or when on a road trip.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Kdb", "review":"I‚Äôm a big fan of micellar water so I was excited to try this product. You just smooth it over your face and lightly rub it in to get rid of makeup and dirt. I then use one of my soft makeup remover cloths to take it off. It‚Äôs kind of like using a cream to take off your makeup, only not as heavy. After I lightly wipe it off, I use a toner pad to remove any extra and that works well for my dry skin. I like the light fresh scent of this and that it takes off makeup without drying my skin. I just think it‚Äôs a bit expensive compared to the micellar waters that I‚Äôve tried. It works a bit better but it‚Äôs still a bit expensive to me. But I do like it and will definitely continue using it.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"dnkb", "review":"I'd never heard of a micellar gel before.  I am pretty impressed with this Ustawi Myrtle Leaf Micellar Water Makeup Remover gel.  I've tried it several ways now:  I have rubbed it into my face on top of my makeup, then removed it with cotton; I've put it on cotton, and swiped my face clean with the cotton wipes.  Both ways seem highly successful, and they both completely clean my face of makeup.  I mean, ENTIRELY.  If you are worried that this gel won't completely clean the face of makeup, rest assured.  It will.

This gel also leaves  your face feeling lightly moisturized and refreshed.  After using it, my face feels dewy and clean, but also hydrated.  It never feels tight.  I am pretty pleased with this gel, and would definitely repurchase it.  It's one of the best micellar products I've ever used, and just for kicks, I used another micellar water to double-check that this one  had completely cleansed my face (it had).  Highly recommended.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"PSB", "review":"I really love the texture of this and how it feels on my skin. It's sort of like using a cooling gel serum to remove your makeup. However, it doesn't do an amazing job. My skin feels comfortable leaving this on for awhile before rinsing (unlike most micellar waters), but it's ultimately not all that effective at its main purpose, which is makeup removal. It especially struggles with mascara.","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Everpure Volume Shampoo
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews[0].review: good value for the money, leaves hair soft and adds volume, will purchase again
reviews[1].review: Got this brand for the 1st time. Really good. Scent is amazing, washes well, doesn‚Äôt weigh down and doesn‚Äôt dry out. Really worth the $$.
reviews[2].review: Continues to add volume, shine, and smoothness to my short hair. I‚Äôve been using this for about five years, at the advice of my hairstylist, and it‚Äôs been the best shampoo I‚Äôve tried. Believe me, I‚Äôve tried a lot ranging in all price ranges. Not all Phyto products work for me however I‚Äôd definitely recommend giving this a try if you‚Äôre looking for something to add volume!
reviews[3].review: Hair washed with Phyto stays clean and smooth for a long time - good for me as I don't like to wash hair too often.  Adds a little more body to my fine hait.
reviews[4].review: Lovely smell and definitely  volumizes and a little thickening too. Love!
reviews[5].review: I purchased this shampoo and conditioner to help my fine hair. It is causing static so I worry it is making my hair brittle.
reviews[6].review: This is a knockoff. The normal shampoo has the consistency of water and lathers very gently. This was the consistency of normal shampoo and was extremely foamy.  One use, clearly not the real product.
reviews[7].review: I have curly hair, that has gotten a bit thinner as I‚Äôm aging.  This is the first shampoo I‚Äôve used that I can actually tell adds volume back into my hair.  Love the scent and happy with the purchase.

name: Fine Flowers Cleansing Face Wash
description: Our Milk Thistle Brightening Spa Edition uses Milk Thistle as our key ingredient, used by the Ancient Greeks and Europeans for as long as 2,000 years. Consists of 81.8% White Milk thistle which was called ‚ÄòMiracle herb‚Äô in ancient Greece. It helps soothe, nourish and revive skin lively while improving overall skin health. Safe for sensitive skin and non-comedogenic, and great for acne-prone skin. Milk Thistle Brightening SPA Cleansing Foam is a deep pore cleanser that cleanses black and white heads with thick fine foam made from Canadian colloidal clay and bambusa arudinacea stem powder. It has a Creamy fine foam provides deep freshness and deep pore cleaning.
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews: [{"reviewer_name":"Cat Wrangler", "review":"I am in love with this cleanser! I have normal to dry skin, and this leaves it feeling smooth and moisturized! It has a mild scent, maybe like almonds, but nothing overpowering, and I'm very sensitive to smells. I didn't do an allergy test prior to using it, but I've had no issues with irritation. It removes dirt and makeup well, without stripping essential oils, and washes away clean. This is a very thick, luxurious cream that foams slightly when combined with water, and a little goes a long way! A bottle is going to last! I like the simplistic packaging and will absolutely purchase this in the future!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Explorer2", "review":"With ingredients like clays and bamboo stem powder, the consistency of this Rawquest cleanser resembles toothpaste without grittiness. It‚Äôs creamy and has a light, spa like scent. It doesn‚Äôt foam up much but I feel clean & fresh after use. Non drying for my aging, combination skin. Didn‚Äôt test it to remove makeup. While this is a nice cleanser for daily use, I don‚Äôt feel it‚Äôs exceptionally better than other average priced cleansers.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Kelsey Mlnarik", "review":"This is a thick and luxurious face wash that comes out of the tube as a super thick cream. A small amount goes a long way- with water it easily works into a rich lather. This face wash does a nice job cleaning my face and leaving it not too dry. The smell is light and sweet, barely there.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"KC", "review":"The description for this product (RAWQUEST Milk Thistle Brightening Cleansing Foam) only notes that ingredients include Milk Thistle and several types of clay. I've enjoyed other skin care products with clay as an ingredient, so I decided to give this a try. I assumed a full list of ingredients and directions would be listed on box or bottle. Unfortunately all is written in a language I can't read. It'd be helpful if, when sold in the US, they were written in English as well so you can check for ingredients that you need or want to avoid. I first washed my hands with it, rather than my face. No irritation or other problems, so I've tried it on my face.\n\nIt has a pleasant fragrance; lathers up into a light foam that easily rinses off. Leaves my skin feeling clean, smooth, but a bit dry, so I use a moisturizer afterwards. I do notice a slight reduction in pores after several uses. No complaints at all...other than the guesswork involved due to the "language barrier".","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"LilGoomb", "review":"Wow, this cleanser feels really good on the skin.  Almost decadent.  To begin with, this cleanser is really thick.  It‚Äôs a luxurious creamy cleanser that smooths over the skin easily.  It has a VERY light smell to it- it‚Äôs very pleasant and almost like a hot tea smell.  The cleanser rinses well off of the skin and does not leave a film.  This made my skin feel very hydrated.  My skin not only felt clean, but nourished as well.  This caused no irritation or dryness- just a great cleanse and spa-like experience for my skin.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"S. C.", "review":"I wanted to try this cleanser because it was described as a deep pore cleanser for dry and sensitive skin. I have really dry skin, especially in the winter. I only tried this once because as soon as I rinsed it off, I felt like my skin had been stripped of all moisture. Even after applying my serum and moisturizer my skin still felt tight and dry. It didn't irritate the skin though and it did clean well, so I gave it three stars for that. If you have more normal or oily skin this may be for you. I can't use this cleanser.","rating":"3.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Snowbird", "review":"I keep this RAWQUEST Milk Thistle Brightening Spa Cleansing Foam in the shower. It doesn‚Äôt take much product to get a thorough cleansing. I squeeze out about a quarter inch of cream into wet palms. I suds the cleansing foam up in my wet hands before I apply it to my face. A little goes a long way. I can get coverage not only on my face but also my neck and upper chest areas. It rinses squeaky clean but doesn‚Äôt leave my skin feeling dry or stripped. The scent is very mild and I don‚Äôt even notice it after rinsing it off.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Dan", "review":"This cleansing foam is unscented and made my face feel extremely clean after using it. The label on the tube is in a different language so it wasn't possible for me to determine what the ingredients are or know the instructions on how long to leave on my face.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Visible Lift Primer
brand_description: L'Or√©al Paris is¬†the world's leading cosmetics brand, making the best of luxury beauty available and accessible to everyone. From makeup and skincare to haircare and haircolor, our pioneering spirit leads our scientific excellence and restless innovation.
reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Rebecca j.", "review":"I‚Äôve tried every primer under the sun and this one is by far the best one!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Taylor Grayson", "review":"This is my favorite primer for everyday makeup. I have really sensitive acneic skin and this is one of the few primers that don‚Äôt break me out. It‚Äôs not terrible tacky like others but makes my skin plump and hydrated so my makeup goes on smoothly. On more minimal days I like mixing it with cover fx drops and going foundation-less.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Aloha Momma", "review":"I have this recommended to me as a lightweight, skin friendly primer. I‚Äôm loving it! I‚Äôm not a heavy make up where but I‚Äôm trying to wear more foundation to even out my skin tone and this primer keeps my foundation on all day.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Skullbuster", "review":"Please remake this product in a container instead of this horrible pump. I could not dispense the product out. Horrible :( . I was really wanting to try this product.","rating":"1.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"kjirsten Phillips", "review":"I have acne prone skin that has hated me the last year. This product Delivers enough moisture without clogging your pores, it smells amazing, and really is a must have with liquid make up","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"MLouise", "review":"Based on all the fantastic reviews, I really expected to love this serum. Turns out I'm kind of between 'like' and 'just ok' (3 1/2 stars rounded up to 4). I didn't leave a review immediately because I wanted to use it for a couple of weeks first.
I found the texture pleasant enough, and it soaks in pretty well. But once soaked in, I find I need to re-apply to get enough moisture. The scent is not perfumey at all. It smells just the tiniest bit medicinal, but it is so light that you could almost say the scent was non-existent.

I am a 60 year old woman and my main issue is dry skin, so I was hoping this serum would help with that, and maybe smooth out my skin texture a bit (I don't have wrinkles yet, and very minor lines).

After using this for a couple of weeks I cannot tell any difference at all in the way it makes my skin look, or in the way my foundation goes on. And looks aside, my skin actually feels a bit dryer than I like when using this serum instead of my regular creams/lotions. So over the last few days I experimented, this serum over one side of my face and some of my regular creams on the other side of my face.
In all cases this serum was not as moisturizing as my good ol' standy products. It's a nice serum, but I find I have to use a lot more of it to get the same moisturizing effect of my other stuff.

I am now using it as a hand lotion and like it better for that purpose. My hands are the one part of my body I do not like a 'moist' feel to, so this works great for that. I just pump a couple of times on the back of one hand, then rub the backs of my hands together to spread it. When it's almost soaked in I go ahead and use my palms and finish rubbing it in over my whole hands. That way I don't get that slippery lotion feel on my hands.

I do like the ingredient list and I feel confident I'm not putting on a crappy product. But it's just not quite what the dry skin  on my face needs. I will use up the bottle, but I won't buy more when it's gone.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Laurel K", "review":"I‚Äôm super picky about skin care products but I‚Äôm super impressed with this one. I like the smell and texture and I honestly think it does make my makeup look smoother and last longer","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amplum", "review":"I really wanted to like this primer but it just didn‚Äôt work for me. It turned my face super red. I was hoping the fact that this was a vegan product would help. Had to return.","rating":"2.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]
