name: Infallible Pro Contour Palette
description: Discover perfectly sculpted contours in 30 seconds. Now, contouring is made easy with L'Oral Paris' Pro Contour Kit. Beautifully coordinated highlight and contour shades highlight, define and contour for a professionally sculpted look. These buildable powders blend effortlessly into the skin for a flawless, fade-proof finish. ‚Ä¢ Contours in 30 Seconds ‚Ä¢ Contours, Highlights and Enhances ‚Ä¢ Unique Pro-Contour Brush ‚Ä¢ The New Pro Look of Longwear Step 1: Use the lighter shade to highlight and create extra dimensions. Step 2: Accentuate contours with the darker shade. Step 3: Blend for a professionally defined look.

This gentle liquid face cleanser & makeup remover from Neutrogena, a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, features a unique, all-in-one formula infused with hydrating hyaluronic acid, a natural moisturizing factor (NMF) that is naturally found in skin, & three types of micellar molecules. name: Micellar Water 3 In 1 (Moisturizing)
description: Lorenti Micellar Water is a gentle and effective makeup remover and cleanser. Formulated with micelles, tiny particles that act like magnets to lift dirt, oil, and makeup from the skin, it effectively cleanses the skin without stripping it of its natural oils. It is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It can be used to remove makeup from the face, eyes, and lips, as well as to cleanse the skin before applying moisturizer. It is easy to use, simply saturate a cotton pad and gently wipe over the skin. It is free of parabens, fragrances, and alcohol, making it gentle on the skin. With Lorenti Micellar Water, you can achieve a refreshed, clean, and clear complexion.

name: Sublime Bronze Tinted Self Tanning Lotion
description:
Coconut Scented Tanning Cream for Self Tan with Applicator Mitt
 
 Love the tan, hate the UV exposure? Get a gorgeous tan anytime of year with Brazi Bronze's gradual self tanner lotion.
 
 Clean-Ingredient Self Tan Lotion
 Say goodbye to mystery drugstore ingredient panels. You need a tanning lotion self tanner with ingredients that nourish your skin, not just make it darker. Brazi's honest ingredients = healthier, more youthful skin and an enviable glow to go with it.
 
 Powered by Natural DHA
 Our incredible self-tanners rely on DHA, an Omega-3 Fatty Acid that naturally brings out the melanoidins in your skin. This plant-based, sugar-derived molecule nourishes as it bronzes, giving you a supple, sunkissed glow that's all your own.
 
 Women's and Men's Self Tanner Body Lotion
 Everyone deserves to feel amazing in their skin. No matter if you're looking for a women's self tanner or self tanner for men, we've got you covered (head to toe).
 
 Self Tanner for Fair Skin & Dark Skin
 No matter your skin tone, Brazi Bronze's melanin-inducing self tanning gradual lotion brings out the warmest glow in your skin. Go from fair to honey, neutral to golden, and deep to rich with a fake tanning made for all skin types. Because the Brazi Bronze formula brings out your natural tan instead of staining it, we consider it the best self tanner for pale skin and dark skin alike.
 
 Vegan, Non-GMO, Never Tested On Animals
 Our commitment to wellness doesn't stop at our skincare formulations. We choose a holistic view of our place on Earth by honoring Vegan and Cruelty-Free certifications.

description:
L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Face Serum is an anti-aging serum to repair wrinkles, redensify skin and resurface skin texture.

Why is Revitalift Triple Power Concentrated 
Facial Serum right for me?
Aging skin requires more intensive action to help restore its youthful look. With age, wrinkles become more permanent, skin loses its resilence and the face, neck and jawline begin to sag.

This luxurious, lightweight face serum helps transform the look of aging skin by working both on skin's surface and penetrating skin's surface by combining Hyaluronic Acid, a proven wrinkle-fighter, with our highest concentration of Pro-Xylane, an exclusive anti-aging super ingredient developed by L'Oreal Paris Laboratories.

ULTRA-INTENSIVE TRIPLE ACTION SKINCARE
1. REPAIR WRINKLES: face serum with Hyaluronic Acid rapidly penetrates skin to help fight each wrinkle

2. REDENSIFY SKIN: Serum with concentrated Pro-Xylane re-volumizes to strengthen skin

3. RESURFACE SKIN TEXTURE: facial serum with LHA smoothes skin and evens skin tone. The result: skin texture is more refined.

Immediately complexion is more radiant. After one week of using face serum, skin texture appears smoother and skin tone is more even. After 4 weeks of use, wrinkles are visibly reduced, skin is revitalized and younger-looking.

For best results, smooth Revitalift Triple Power Concentrated Face Serum Treatment over the face, neck and jawline every morning and night before applying moisturizer.

brand: [{"reviewer_name":"Sofia Taha","review":"Great buy ! Beautiful color it has a hint of sparkly.. I like the navy blue color because black is to harsh especially when your older.. This softens the look I use it as an eyeliner using water dipped thin slanted brush.. Try it !","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Sierra","review":"i found this product at the cvs drug store in my hometown, however, it was priced at $10-12, which i believe is a bit high for a "non-name brand" or non department store eye shadow, however these are just the prices of living in southren california alone the coast i assume. On amazon, i found it for much less, i think i paid $5-6 with shipping included. When i recieved this product, there was some plastic covering or something inside of it that i did NOT previously find in the one i opened (probably against the stores rules) in the store. I was a little suspicious of this, it was a gray piece of plastic that had a small piece in the middle that stuck straight up, so that someone could easily pull it upward and out of the jar, after i did this, i found the black eye shadow underneath it. I don't know if others experienced this or not??... I think it could have been a mistake from the packaging department, they could have accidentally not taken this plastic piece out of the makeup jar, or it could have just been used to take up space in the jar. Either way, it looked like it was used to press the powder into the jar tightly and it pressed it to form the shape of the jar. I felt a little cheated out of my makeup, like maybe it was now half the amount that was originally supposed to be in the jar, however i could not complain because it was half the price as well. So i assumed it was a mistake and kept inspecting my new product. i looked on the outside and it seemed like the same exact jar and size, however, it seemed like there were less sparkles in the black color that i received than the color that i originally saw at the store.Then i decided to take the color and try it on my hand. i took my finger and pressed it into the shadow and swiped it across the top of my hand, like most of us girls do when we want to see what a product will look like once used on the skin, this again looked like it had maybe not less glitter, because there was actually a lot of glitter, but the eye shadow did look less pigmented, or like it was gray, and had to be applied in multiple layers to achieve the black black look to it, and the sparkles seemed to be all silvery, not like the rainbow sparkles i had seen at the store. i am planning on going into the store again, maybe purchasing it there to see if they are the same, or taking the one i now have into the store to compare them., it could just be me, or the lighting of the store versus my house, that threw me off. whatever the case, i am being extremely harsh and critical. because i was only purchasing this color due to the specific sparkle it  had to it in the store, i have plenty of black eye shadow, and i do not need another one. So that is why i am being so judgmental about the specific color. Also, i found it weird for there to be a big piece of plastic pressed up against the powder in the jar that is not visible from the outside. And that plastic piece was not in any of the other ones i had open at the store. Other than those two minor details, this product was great. i loved the color and how it went on, it was extremely sparkly and glittery, it was highly pigmented if u used a lot or put multiple layers, it was almost gel or cream-like, but not. so that made it easy to apply, and it did not crease or flake onto the lower under eye or cheek bones. I showed my mom this product and she was like "oww, wow that is a beautiful color, look at all those sparkles, i wanna try that!!' So  yes this color is great, the application is great, however i must deduct one star due to the weird plastic thing being in there, and not in the others, and due to my previous viewing of it . when i put it on my hand before, or "tried it on my skin" in the store (which i was again not supposed to do... oops.. but how else am i gonna be able to tell, there are no testers?) it went on much easier with a higher amount of pigment, a stronger and darker swipe of black went on easier, and the sparkles were a rainbow/variety of colors, not just all silver sparkles.Either way it is still a pretty color, and i like the consistency of the product itself. It is easy to put on without having to use a lot of the product over and over, maybe 2-3 layers would achieve the color in the jar, and sometimes this is good, so that a lighter color can be applied when blending the color into other colors. I just wanted black with an array of different colored sparkles in it, when in actuality it is a black with silver sparkles, so many that it gives it a metallic gun-metal gray look to the color when it is applied.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"S. Kessler","review":"The color is vibrant it lasts all day it‚Äôs just beautiful!!","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Smooth Sugar Clear Scrub
brand:
[{"reviewer_name":"Wildflower","review":"I bought the duo (scalp scrub + dandruff shampoo) and let me start by saying that the jasmine scent is DIVINE. I'm not one of those people who has a super strong or easily offended sense of smell (pleasant fragrances don't bother me much even when they are quite powerful), so perhaps this would be too intense for someone who is more sensitive to fragrance, but holy moly this stuff smells aaaahhhhmazing! It's honestly the best smelling shampoo I've ever bought!

With that being said, although I like the shampoo, but I bought this set specifically for the scalp scrub which I didn't find effective. Again, it smells fantastic (same scent as the shampoo), but the scrubby ground apricot particles just aren't plentiful enough to do anything. Plus, I have long hair, and although it's fine, it was damn near impossible to get this stuff down into my scalp enough to exfoliate at all -- and my hair isn't even that thick. So if you have short hair this might work great, but if it's long (especially thick and long) I'd advise that the scrub probably won't do much for you. You might be better off creating your own scrub via an online DIY recipe using sugar or something of that nature.

Also, if your main priority is exfoliation and scalp stimulation, I'd HIGHLY recommend getting a cheap scalp scrubber shampoo brush (the little round kind with a finger grip and flexible silicone spikes).

I personally bought this one: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B086SC9NH3?psc=1&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_title

It was only $2.39 with free Prime shipping and it works great. Really gets down into your roots and scrubs the scalp very nicely, but without being harsh or painful. Gives you the tingles and leaves your scalp feeling super clean. Feels wonderful!

As for the dandruff shampoo... I don't actually have dandruff (as I mentioned, I bought this duo specifically just for the scalp scrub), but I'm pleasantly surprised by the shampoo. It's creamy, lathers luxuriously, smells freaking AMAZING, cleans nicely, and feels soothing, so I have no complaints. I can't attest to whether or not it stops dandruff, but it contains the proper active ingredient and feels soothing and refreshing, so I have no reason to think it wouldn't.

All-in-all these are nice products, smell fantastic, and clean nicely, but I just don't find the scrub effective at all. However the shampoo is great, so I'm still giving this purchase 5 stars. üëç","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amy Zhao","review":"I have medium-level dandruff that builds up and makes my scalp feel disgusting if I don't use this hair scrub. Using a regular shampoo and conditioner didn't do anything for my dandruff, and it would reappear when my hair dried, with my scalp still feeling pretty bad. I tried this product after a Loreal salesperson handed me a sample at a UCLA event, and from the very first time I tried it, I knew that it worked perfect for me. I've bought this continuously for two years, and I'm only getting around to writing a review now. So, pro: this stuff works!
The scent when you scoop some of this stuff out is pretty strong, and I don't doubt it might be unpleasant for some people while rubbing it into their hair. However, I've never really minded the scent, and once you wash it out, it only leaves a faint trace that's way more pleasant. I've gotten compliments on how my hair smelled after using this scrub.  Furthermore, when you wash it out, it de-tangles your hair, so it's like a pseudo-conditioner! However, I still recommend using a conditioner because I tried only using the hair scrub and it made my hair really frizzy.
The hair scrub gets rid of most of my dandruff, but to get the rest of it, I also use the everfresh antidandruff shampoo and conditioner of the same line.  So, to be clear, I do hair scrub -> shampoo -> conditioner, and not the hair scrub last. I only use the shampoo on my scalp, and then the conditioner on the rest of my hair and the ends, and I end up with a clean-feeling scalp and incredibly soft and not frizzy hair. I think Loreal really hit it out the park with these products. My only complaint is that I go through the hair scrub pretty fast, but I might be using too much of it each time I shower. Since I have long hair, I have to take big scoops and then spread them out and rub it in slow circles to really cover my whole scalp. Then again, the hair scrub is only $8, so the expense isn't too bad!","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Emily","review":"Been shopping around for a dandruff shampoo that's not as harsh as Head and Shoulders but not as weak as some of the more "organic" sulfate-free products out there. I think this shampoo is the compromise I'm looking for.

I have highly oily, low porosity, fine hair with a small dandruff issue and no history of dying or bleaching. I wash my hair almost every day to remove the oil, but only use this shampoo every other day. It resolves my itching and flakiness for about 48 hours. I notice slight itching the night before I wash. However, there are times where I've washed with this every day and my hair is fine. It doesn't dry it out or weaken it. Works great for me!

The one thing I don't like about the shampoo is the overpowering fragrance. It's "Indian lilac" but in my opinion doesn't smell like flowers. It smells like a salon. And it's strong. It took a while to get used to. If the smell could be toned down a notch that'd be great.","rating":"5.0","source":"Amazon"}]

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"kstars", "review":"I guess I‚Äôm late to the micellar water game but I‚Äôm really enjoying this gentle cleanser! The scent is light and pleasant, my skin feels soft and clean after using, and the product texture is kind of like a very thin/watery gel.

I didn‚Äôt know what to expect so I used three pumps the first time and it was WAY too much product - which is really saying something in this day and age! I pumped directly onto the cotton round and it soaked right in yet was still completely effective at cleansing my face (i.e., it didn‚Äôt stay ‚Äúin‚Äù the cotton, if that makes sense). I really don‚Äôt know how to explain it except to say that I am truly impressed that one squirt was enough to do my whole face, neck, and d√©collet√©. I feel like other products are absorbed by the tool (brush, cotton ball/round, etc.) which quickly depletes your source.

I like the ethically sourced ingredients and culture; although the bottle is only 6.8oz you get two which makes the price VERY reasonable for something that performs so well ($23.87 at the time of this review). I would definitely order this again, highly recommend!

Thank you for reading my review, I hope it was helpful!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"me", "review":"This micellar water is the best I've ever used. It easily removes even my wifes waterproof makeup without irritating her sensitive skin. It leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, clean, and hydrated. I love that it's made with natural, clean ingredients and is free of harmful chemicals. I've also noticed that my skin doesn't get as oily the next day when I use this micellar water.

My only complaint is the bottle and pump style. Since the liquid is watery, it can be messy to dispense. I'd prefer a bottle with a cap, but that's a minor inconvenience. reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Amazon Customer", "review":"I have sensitive skin so my complaint is not that this is a terrible product but that it did not work for my sensitive skin. When I first applied it I thought it might be a good replacement for the recently discontinued nutrgna product. It went on well and seemed to moisturize and smelled fine. But maybe three days later my skin started to break out a little -- then alot. And it didn't stop breaking out for over a week even though I had stopped using this so it definitely made my skin react on a pretty high level. Bummer -- but like I said, it seemed fine at first...","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"John Middleton", "review":"I recently tried the CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion, and to be honest, I wasn't very impressed. It's marketed as a night cream with hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, which sounded promising, but it fell short of my expectations.

First of all, the texture of the lotion is a bit thick and heavy for my liking. It felt greasy on my skin and took a while to fully absorb. I prefer a lighter, more easily absorbed moisturizer, especially for nighttime use.

Additionally, I didn't notice any significant improvement in my skin after using this product for a few weeks. I had hoped that the hyaluronic acid and niacinamide would help with hydration and skin tone, but I didn't see any noticeable difference. My skin still felt dry, and I didn't experience any reduction in redness or blemishes.

The packaging is also a bit inconvenient. It comes in a pump bottle, which can be difficult to control the amount of product dispensed. I often found myself pumping out too much or too little, which was frustrating.

Overall, the CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion didn't live up to the hype for me. While it may work better for some people with different skin types or concerns, it just didn't provide the results I was hoping for. I'll be exploring other options for my nighttime skincare routine.","rating":"4.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Brion", "review":"Love Cera Ve lotions!  I have both the AM and PM which I've used  on my face for years.  They are both gentle, moisturizing, non scented and do not cause acne.  Dermatologists like this brand also.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

name: Men+Care Cream Hydrate Plus, Ultra Hydrating
description: Awaken your skin and senses with Dove Gentle Exfoliating Body Wash. This nourishing body wash, with 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture, gently cleanses and rejuvenates the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours. From the No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand, this nourishing body wash has a luxurious lather you'll love to use in the shower after a long day. Dove Gentle Exfoliating Body Wash has been developed with millions of MicroMoisture droplets and plant-based moisturizers, creating a formula that works to gently cleanse and moisturize skin and nourish your microbiome ‚Äì skin's living protective layer. This gentle skin cleanser effectively cleanses using exfoliating sea minerals while nourishing your skin. As a specially designed body wash for soft skin, your skin will feel as soft as it looks. This revitalizing body wash also has a 98% biodegradable formula*. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water and minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302 and/or 310). This gentle skin cleanser is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles, vegan, and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world, so you can feel good about switching to Dove.

name: Gentle Exfoliating Nourishing Body Wash
description: Dove Pink Beauty Bar combines a gentle cleansing formula with our signature 1/4 moisturizing cream to hydrate and nourish skin, instead of leaving skin feeling dry and tight like an ordinary bar soap might. It‚Äôs the classic Dove Beauty Bar formula with a delicate pink hue. Dove mild cleansers help skin retain its natural moisture, which helps keep skin hydrated, and Dove Beauty Bar even helps replenish skin-natural nutrients that can be lost during the cleansing process. Use your Beauty Bar as a facial cleanser or as a gentle skin cleanser for your body and hands. For best results, rub between wet hands and massage the smooth, creamy lather over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. The secret to beautiful skin is moisture, and no other bar hydrates skin better than Dove. Formulated with mild cleansers that care for skin as you cleanse, this moisturizing bar helps deliver nourishment and leave your face and body feeling soft and smooth and looking more radiant than ordinary soap does. Our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential.

reviews[0].review: Theraplex has been my go to moisturizer for the last 10 years or so, it was recommended to me by my dermatologist and I‚Äôve been hooked since. Upon opening my package I received a nice letter from the owner Michael thanking me for the continuing support. It was nice to receive that kind of gratitude. It‚Äôs the best moisturizer, and I always highly recommend to all my peers. Thanks again!
reviews[1].review: Been using it for a whole now and it works great on my skin and my wife loves it and is able to use it as her face break out from many other lotions. This one really hydrates the skin
reviews[2].review: My wife and I were introduced to the original Theraplex by a dermatologist we were both seeing.  It was amazingly effective for dry hands common among older folks and those with blood glucose issues.  But an 8 ounce tub is about $30.  This 8 ounce pump was a third to a fourth that price and is very, very close to exactly as effective.  The pump bottle is easier to use than a tub with a threaded cap.  When applied, it is absorbed rapidly into the skin.  Within a minute or two of initial application I find my hands no longer feel the least bit greasy but the emollient effect is substantial and lasting.  My wife does complain that when I use it in the car it leaves the steering wheel slippery, so mind that.  I guess it doesn't soak into fake leather.  I will be buying it again when this runs out.  I might still buy the tub version to keep by my bedside, but this stuff works well and is an excellent value.
sustainability_claims: Dove paving the way with industry-leading innovations, eliminating the use of virgin plastic where possible, and using alternative materials and packaging innovations that are setting the agenda for the beauty industry.

A gentle cleanser that cares for your skin as you cleanse, Dove Beauty Bar helps deliver nourishment and leave your face and body feeling soft and smooth and looking more radiant than an ordinary bar soap does. name: MEN + CARE Body and Face Wash, Sensitive Skin
description: Transform every shower into a caring ritual for your skin! Dove Face + Body Cleanser for sensitive skin has active skin nourishers that help to naturally repair the skin barrier rather than simply protect. Support your skin with continuous nourishment for 24 hours with this body wash. Dove Men+Care Advanced Care Sensitive Calm Face + Body Cleanser is specially formulated for men's sensitive skin, with natural aloe extract and 25% hydration balm, for calming dry skin. The triple action moisturizer treats sensitive and dry skin, it repairs, nourishes, and hydrates all whilst in the shower. Our free from sulfate cleansers body wash is made with plant-based moisturizers to transform even the driest skin in just one shower. Squeeze a generous amount of this body cleanser into your palms. Massage the hydrating body wash onto your skin, taking a moment to enjoy the rich lather before rinsing off. This nourishing body wash is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA, vegan and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look‚Äîreaching over ¬º of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format that radically reduces plastic use. As one of the largest beauty brands in the world, we are revealing an agenda-setting commitment to tackle the global beauty industry‚Äôs plastic waste issue.\n

reviews:
[{"reviewer_name":"Adam R", "review":"So I had very oily and very long hair. My ends were super dry and brittle, but the closer to the scalp you got the oilier my hair was. So I gave my hair a major chop. Going from length of my lower back to above my shoulders. Before I cut my hair, my magical day was 3. I had to wash my hair every 3 days in order to not look gross. When I cut it, it felt amazing, light, pure freedom! My hair was super healthy, I was in love! However, the next day after my vigorous shampoo and cut, my hair was incredibly greasy. AFTER 1 DAY! ONE!!! So I started scrambling, because my hair didnt even make it 24 hours before being a greasy mess, and I had not added anything to it, no oils or anything so I was frustrated. So I did a massive amount of research that landed me on this product. I ordered 2 because its a small bottle. This had changed my hair and fixed my problem. However, since my problem was soooo extreme, what I do is that every 3 days I wash my hair with this 3 times, until its literally squeaky. 3 times, wash, rinse, wash, rinse, wash, rinse. I dont use any conditioner or any other shampoo. Once it makes the squeaky sound, I know I have accomplished what I need to make it last. The last thing I do is place a tiny tiny drop of biosilk silk therapy on my hand, and run it throughout the towel dry hair, this helps keep the frizziness down without weighing down the hair (plus it smells amazing). So long story but this produc saved my hair, i will use it forever..... or as long as i can find it.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Debi", "review":"I was on the hunt for a simple multi use soap that would simplify my routine and leave my skin comfortable, because while I enjoy my usual multi product regimen- somedays I just ain‚Äôt got time for that.
The dove pink bar far exceeds my expectations. Creamy lather, soft skin that isn‚Äôt tight feeling after. The scent is pretty, though I think it‚Äôs just broaching the side of too sweet and cloying, but happily it doesn‚Äôt cross the line. The scent itself reminds me of a clean rose water. But after rinsing I don‚Äôt smell of it, which is good for me, I don‚Äôt have to worry about it affecting any perfumes I wear or when I go without fragrances  irritating anyone who is scent sensitive.
My face feels great and is completely makeup free after washing. My hands are less dry feeling as well.
It‚Äôs classic for a reason, and both performance and price make it a great value. Im happy to highly recommend it!","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"},{"reviewer_name":"Amazing Grace", "review":"Especially for the winter time, a lot of soaps can cause one's skin to become even drier, but one need not worry about this Dove moisturizing soap.","rating":"5.0 out of 5 stars","source":"Amazon"}]

description: Take control of your skin with Alba Botanica Acnedote Maximum Strength Invisible Treatment Gel. Made with a 2% salicylic acid and willow bark solution, this gel treats and prevents acne and breakouts. It is also not tested on animals. Includes one 0.5 oz. tube of Alba Botanica Acnedote Maximum Strength Invisible Treatment Gel. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We‚Äôre dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. name: Powder Antiperspirant Deodorant
description: For soft, smooth underarms and invisible protection that lasts all day, look no further than Dove Invisible Solid Powder Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Formulated with ¬º moisturizers, this antiperspirant deodorant for women leaves your underarm skin feeling soft and smooth. The 0% alcohol (ethanol) formula helps your underarm skin recover from irritation caused by shaving, too. And it doesn't stop there. This deodorant stick gives you all day antiperspirant protection from underarm sweat and odor, has a powdery scent that indulges your senses throughout the day, and glides on for easy application. Plus, it‚Äôs invisible and leaves no white marks behind, so you can stay fresh, comfortable and confident all day long. To get the most out of your antiperspirant deodorant stick, swipe it over cool, dry underarms two or three times until an even layer is applied. Its invisible solid format means you can get dressed and go, without worrying about deodorant stains. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. name: Clarify Charcoal & Hydrate Shampoo
description: Clogged pores, blackheads, blemishes and excess oil? Biore Charcoal Acne Clearing Cleanser for Oily Skin deep cleans, penetrates pores and absorbs excess oil. With Charcoal, known for its oil-absorbing properties, this cleanser works with acne-fighting salicylic acid and skin purifying technology to treat existing acne and help prevent future breakouts by cleaning deep down in your pores. The result is clearer skin in just 2 days. Biore Skincare targets the root of all skin problems-the evil clogged pore. So when it comes to dirt and oil, we take a no nonsense approach to fight smarter, not harder. Our scrub, liquid, powder, strip, mask and bar cleansing products go straight to the source of those pesky pores for deeply clean, beautiful skin. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

name: Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner
description: Protect your hair from daily wear and tear with Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner. It gently conditions your hair with its mild, nourishing formula, leaving you with the look and feel of soft and silky hair. This moisturizing conditioner nourishes hair from deep within each strand, leaving it up to five times smoother. Designed for hair that is a touch dry, Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner helps to moisturize your dry hair, giving it a smooth and manageable appearance, but without weighing it down. To experience comprehensive benefits, use with Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo. As part of the Dove Nutritive Solutions range, this Dove conditioner is formulated with Pro-Moisture Complex, which helps to smooth hair on the outside while deeply and progressively nourishing it from within. With regular use, this Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Deep Conditioner helps to make hair look and feel healthier in the long run. With every wash, it instantly detangles hair, improving manageability and leaving you with the appearance of soft and silky hair. How to use: For softer hair that feels up to five times smoother, gently apply Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner to wet hair after shampooing, concentrating on the mid-lengths and ends, and then rinse. For best results, use with Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo. Suitable for daily use. With this multi-pack, your hair can stay softer for longer!

name: 0% Aluminum Deodorant Coconut and Pink Jasmine
description: Find yourself throwing away an empty deodorant month after month? Join a new deodorant revolution with Dove refillable deodorant. With just a small change in your routine, you can be kind to your skin and kind to the planet at the same time. Buy once, refill for life with our new deodorant format. The Refillable deodorant Stick container is made from durable stainless steel, designed to last for life and never end in the trash. Plus, the Deodorant refills are kept fresh in packs made from 98% recycled plastic, and everything is packaged in 100% fsc-graded paper from well-managed forests. That's not all. This Deodorant without alcohol is designed to give you the Dove Care you know and love, with 1/4 moisturizers, leaving your underarm skin soft and smooth. Giving you up to 48 hours of odor protection, This moisturizing deodorant Stick comes with a soothing, delicate coconut and pink jasmine scent. For best results, apply this Deodorant after showering or bathing. Swipe it up and down on cool, dry underarms two or three times until an even layer has been applied. Once your refillable deodorant Stick runs out, simply place a new refill onto the base, twist and click, and you're good to go again. Don't forget to recycle the refill plastic pack. Start your new deodorant routine now with new Dove refillable Deodorant Starter Kit. It contains a refillable stainless-steel case, designed to be durable so you'll never have to throw it away, and one deodorant Stick refill with our Caring Deodorant formula and the coconut and pink jasmine scent you love. Dove is on a mission to help reduce waste around the world, from using alternative materials to creating packaging innovations like Dove refillable deodorant.

The stick itself smells good, does it‚Äôs job but just annoyed that it seems like the case itself was in use by someone prior.

name: Pure and Sensitive
description: Experience a shower like no other with Dove shower foam body wash for sensitive skin. It's the first-ever self-foaming body wash with pump innovation from Dove, providing the light skin feel you want with the care Your skin needs. The instant foam moisturizing body wash contains our NutriumMoisture technology and our mildest cleansers, creating a light, airy lather that rinses away quickly. Dove shower foam sensitive skin foaming body wash has a hypoallergenic, nourishing formula that reaches deep into the surface layers of the skin and helps replenish skin's natural nutrients, which are essential for maintaining your skin's natural moisture balance. This helps leave skin looking and feeling healthy, soft, and smooth. To use, Simply press the pump bottle, spread the soft lather, and enjoy a quick rinse. With over 250 pumps per bottle, you can use the moisturizing Shower foam generously. Dove has a 60-year history in skin cleansing, now giving you more skin cleansing options without compromising on care. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look - helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential. Within the stratum corneum.

name: Exfoliating Body Polish Kiwi Seeds & Cool Aloe
description: What does beautiful skin look like to you? Smooth? Silky? Soft? With Dove Kiwi Seeds & Cool Aloe Exfoliating Body Polish, you get all three benefits from one Dove exfoliating body scrub. With a rich, whipped texture, our body polish gives you a beautifully creamy coverage. Enriched with our classic 1/4 moisturizing cream, this exfoliating scrub deeply nourishes and cares for your skin as it buffs away dull, dry skin in the shower. Restore your skin's natural nutrients with this shower exfoliator, as it bursts with a fresh kiwi and aloe fragrance to lift your senses. You'll be left refreshed and soothed with every wash. To use, scoop a generous amount of this polish out of the jar. Massage Dove Exfoliating Body Polish all over your body in circular motions for creamy coverage, and then rinse away to reveal silky smooth skin. Focus on rough spots like knees and elbows! Use 3-4 times per week as part of your skin care regimen, followed by Dove Body Wash or Beauty Bar for touchably soft skin. It's just two steps for your softest, smoothest skin yet! Try our Dove Body Polish to get beach-ready skin, prep skin for tanning, or to help exfoliate skin before shaving to help prevent ingrown hairs.

name: Deve Olive & Argan Cleansing Oil
description: DHC Olive Concentrated Cleansing Oil is the perfect cleansing oil for normal to dry skin types, made to satisfy hydration-hungry complexions. This powerful makeup remover is formulated with Oleic Acid from Olive Oil, to remove makeup instantly, while conditioning and protecting your skin from dryness. As you massage the cleanser in, it clings to makeup, pore-clogging oil, and even dead skin cells. The formula rinses away as a milky emulsion taking dirt and impurities with it, leaving skin ultra-clean, conditioned, and perfectly moisture balanced. In addition, it's free of parabens and potential skin-irritating ingredients like synthetic fragrance and coloring. Simple yet effective, with nothing unnecessary that might harm the delicate balance of healthy skin. Nourishes, hydrates and softens skin with Flor de Aceite (flower of the virgin oil), the essence of organic olive oil captured from its first crush before the olives are pressed

name: Exfoliating Body Polish Pomegranate Seeds & Shea Butter
description: There‚Äôs one essential step for achieving smooth skin that shouldn‚Äôt be overlooked: exfoliation. So, gently buff away dry, dull skin while caring for your skin with Dove Pomegranate Seeds & Shea Butter Exfoliating Body Polish. Made with 1/4 moisturizing cream, this exfoliating body scrub restores skin‚Äôs nutrients as it exfoliates, leaving your skin feeling silky smooth. With a smooth, easily spreadable texture, this Dove body exfoliator gives you beautifully creamy coverage while releasing the sweet scent of pomegranate. Get all the effectiveness you‚Äôd look for in exfoliators or a shower scrub, but with the nourishment and care that your skin needs in the shower. To use, scoop a generous amount of Dove Pomegranate Seed & Shea Butter Exfoliating Body Scrub out of the jar. Massage all over your body in circular motions for creamy coverage, and then rinse away to reveal silky smooth skin. Use 3-4 times per week as part of your skin care regimen, followed by Dove Body Wash or Beauty Bar for touchably soft skin. Try Dove Body Polish to get beach-ready skin, prep skin for tanning, or to help exfoliate before shaving to help prevent ingrown hairs. You'll love the feeling of silky smooth skin all over. Plus, when you buy Dove, you can be assured you‚Äôre caring for your skin with products that are PETA Cruelty-Free certified. Company-wide, we‚Äôre also on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look‚Äîreaching over 1/4 of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We‚Äôre also committed to substantially reducing plastic waste by 2025. This includes reducing our use of virgin plastic by 20,500 metric tons annually, launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles and trialing new refillable formats for certain select products.\n

name: Total Damage Treatment
description: You‚Äôve probably heard of the benefits of white clay for your skin, but have you thought about using it on your hair? Inspired by the white clay benefits found in skin care, Dove Mineral Strengthens Hair Mask helps nourish and strengthen your strands, so you don‚Äôt have to worry about damaged hair. Tangle-teasing, heat, UV rays, hair breakage... the list goes on. Our hair goes through a lot that can weaken it and cause hair breakage. This hair mask (or hair masque as some people would call it), for damaged hair helps to nourish and strengthen damaged hair and leave you with up to 99% less hair breakage*. Plus, its nourishing formula is infused with minerals to moisturize every strand, and leave it looking as healthy as it feels. Harnessing the power of white clay, this hair strengthening mask adds a touch of luxury to your daily routine. Apply a generous amount of the Dove Mineral Strengthens + White Clay Hair Mask to mid-lengths and tips. Leave for 3-5 minutes and then rinse thoroughly before drying your hair. After applying the mask generously, take a moment to enjoy its earthy scent while it works on your hair. Time to rinse away? Try using a wide tooth comb. This helps you get a proper rinse and tackle any unwanted knots. After using this hair strengthening clay mask, you‚Äôll be left with tangle-free, clean and smooth hair when you get out of the shower.

description: Have you been wondering how to get soft and comfortable underarms? Try Dove Advanced Care Caring Coconut Dry Spray Antiperspirant Deodorant. The pampering antiperspirant spray infused with a creamy coconut scent leaves your underarms feeling healthy and protected. This Antiperspirant for women, with Dove‚Äôs a quarter moisturizers with natural oil and an alcohol-free formula, is kind to delicate underarm skin and helps it recover from the irritation that regular shaving can cause. After a few uses, you‚Äôll notice that your underarm skin looks and feels smoother. Tthis Dove antiperspirant deodorant for women doesn‚Äôt compromise on antiperspirant protection. It will keep you dry and fresh all day with up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection. For best results, apply this Dove antiperspirant for women to dry skin after showering and enjoy fresh, comfortably dry skin from morning to night. Dove is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We‚Äôre on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem ‚Äì because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove Antiperspirant Deodorants deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously.\n

description: Dove DermaSeries dry skin relief ‚Äì replenishing body lotion When expert care meets lasting comfort for very dry skin every day. Introducing a non-sticky Dove body lotion specially crafted for clinically dry skin. A perfect addition to your beauty regimen, this fragrance free lotion is clinically proven to replenish extremely dry skin, restoring skin's natural protective barrier over time. With a unique blend of AminoSilk Complex, patented PPAR technology, and some of Dove's most powerful moisturizers, Dove DermaSeries body lotion for dry skin unlocks your skin's natural ability to be and feel healthier. Beautiful-feeling skin starts with care. Expert care for severely dry, itchy skin This formula is one of the best body lotions for dry skin restoring moisture in all layers of the skin while sealing the outer layer from external irritants. This body moisturizer is hypoallergenic, fragrance-free and non-sticky providing constant and weightless nourishment throughout the day. How to use Experience this Dove lotion for dry, itchy skin, for instant relief and lasting nourishment. - Apply 3-4 pumps of this fragrance free lotion on your hands and massage on all over your body until fully absorbed. - Apply Dove body lotion every morning and evening, and as required during the day. - Complete your regimen with Dove DermaSeries gentle cleansing body wash.\n

name: DermaSeries Dry Skin Relief Milky Face Wash
description: Dove DermaSeries dry skin relief gentle cleansing face wash Looking for a gentle daily face wash for dry skin? Dove DermaSeries dry skin relief gentle cleansing face wash is a soap-free cleanser with a unique blend of skin-natural lipids and mild cleansing actives that offers creamy care for dry, delicate skin. Use the Dove fragrance free, hypoallergenic face wash every day to gently remove impurities and improve visual dryness. It is one of the best facial cleansers for dry skin from Dove. Creamy, gentle cleansing for extremely dry skin From the makers of the #1 dermatologist recommended skin cleansing brand for dry skin, the Dove DermaSeries face wash is 100% free of cleansing surfactant, non-foaming and ultra-mild. It has a unique emollient combination to seal in moisture without greasiness and is clinically proven to significantly improve the quality of skin over time. The creamy consistency allows you to use with or without water. Beautiful-feeling skin starts with care. How to use This hypoallergenic, fragrance-free face wash gently removes impurities while deeply moisturising your skin. - Lather Dove fragrance-free face wash in your hands and apply on wet face in circular motions, or apply it on dry face with a cotton round. - Rinse your skin before patting dry. description: Infused with the fresh fragrance of crisp cucumber and honeydew melon blended with green tea, Dove Advanced Care Cool Essentials Dry Spray Antiperspirant deodorant.is ideal for a long-lasting invigorating, fresh scent. In addition to staying cool all day long, Dove antiperspirant spray helps you care for your underarms. This alcohol-free formula helps delicate underarm skin recover from the underarm irritation that regular shaving can cause. For best results, apply this Dove antiperspirant deodorant.to dry skin after showering and enjoy fresh, comfortably dry skin from morning to night. Dove is certified cruelty-free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We‚Äôre on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem ‚Äì because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove Antiperspirant deodorant. deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously.

name: Men+Care Sensitive Fresh Awake Body and Face Wash
description: Looking for a body wash for men that‚Äôs designed for an active lifestyle? Add Dove Men+Care SportCare Power+Renew Body and Face Wash to your men‚Äôs skin care and shower routine! This body wash for men is specifically designed for men‚Äôs skin by the #1 dermatologist recommended men‚Äôs brand. Dove Men+Care SportCare Power+Renew Body and Face Wash uses its unique MicroMoisture Technology that activates as you lather the lightweight gel to help hydrate skin and protect it against dryness. Sweat, friction from exercise, extra showers, and towel drying make your skin vulnerable and could lead to sweat rash, chaffing, and irritation. Our Power+Renew body wash for men is developed specifically for men who give it their all at work, at the gym, and beyond. It‚Äôs also just as effective for cleansing hands. Dove Men+Care Body and Face Wash is an easy-to-rinse, hydrating body wash that is clinically proven to fight dry skin better than a regular men‚Äôs body soap or cleanser. It is also gentle enough to use as a men‚Äôs face wash. SportCare Power+Renew features a cooling peppermint scent and exfoliating grains to help stimulate muscle recovery. For best use, pump Dove Men+Care Body and Face Wash on to your palm and rub your hands together to work the shower gel into a light foam to activate the MicroMoisture Technology. Apply to your body and face. Rinse thoroughly. Dove Men+Care champion active fathers and the need for paid paternity leave. Find out more about their work in celebrating fatherhood and raising awareness around parental leave on the Dove Men+Care site. And as part of our commitment towards sustainability, each Dove Men+Care body and face wash bottle is recyclable and made with 100% recycled plastic and is PETA certified Cruelty Free.

With regular use, the formula, with caffeine, improves men‚Äôs scalp health and helps eliminate flakes with Pyrithione Zinc. It also helps strengthen hair, leaving it visibly healthy, thicker and resilient, while helping to control and eliminate dandruff flakes. It is a dual 2-in-1 formula that functions as a shampoo and conditioner so that it cleanses and conditions simultaneously, leaving men‚Äôs hair stronger and more resilient against breakage, and helping to flake eliminate flakes. It is available in the following sizes: 12 oz and 25.4 oz. Great hair care doesn‚Äôt stop in the shower! Complete your hair care regimen and get the perfect look with the Dove Men + Care Sculpting Paste for a natural look, Defining Pomade for a sleek and polished finish, or Control Gel for all-day hold. Use it with the entire line of Dove Men + Care products for the perfect grooming regimen, such as Dove Men + Care Hydration Balance Body Wash and Dove Men + Care Cool Silver Dry Spray Antiperspirant.

name: Sensitive Skin Nourishing Body Wash
description: Nourish your skin senses with Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash for sensitive skin. This nourishing body wash, with 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture, gently cleanses and nourishes the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours. From the No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand, this nourishing body wash has a luxurious lather you'll love to use in the shower after a long day. Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash has been developed with millions of MicroMoisture droplets and plant-based moisturizers, creating a formula that works to gently cleanse and moisturize skin and nourish your microbiome ‚Äì skin's living protective layer. As a specially designed body wash for soft skin, your skin will feel as soft as it looks. This nourishing body wash also has a 98% biodegradable formula*. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water and minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302 and/or 310). This gentle skin cleanser is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles, vegan, and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world, so you can feel good about switching to Dove. Plus, this hydrating body wash is made without sulfates or parabens. How to use: For 24 hours of radiant skin, squeeze a generous amount of Dove Hypoallergenic Sensitive Skin Body Wash into your palms. Massage the body wash onto your skin, taking a moment to enjoy the rich lather and hypoallergenic fragrance, before rinsing off to reveal soft, smooth skin. Dove care goes further than moisturizing skin care with 100% recycled plastic bottles and, globally, Dove is PETA approved. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look-reaching over ¬º of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030.

name: Men+Care Sensitive Clean Defense Body and Face Wash
description: To start the day on a clean note, add Dove Men+Care Skin Defense Body and Face Wash to your shower and skin care routine. This highly effective antibacterial cleansing formula is tough on dirt and germs, but easy and comfortable on skin. Dove's smooth, hydrating body wash uniquely formulated for men helps keep skin healthy looking and strong, and is clinically proven to eliminate 99% of bacteria. With MicroMoisture technology, that activates when lathering, Dove Men+Care Skin Defense Body Wash helps to lock in your skin's natural moisture and leave it feeling fresh and hydrated. This #1 Dermatologist recommended brand body wash can be used both as a body wash and a face wash. Delivering total skin comfort, this mens body wash rinses away cleanly without leaving any residue behind so you get a refreshing clean. The formula leaves you with a clean body and a crisp, refreshing scent. Now you can start your day with skin that feels healthy, protected, clean, and refreshed with this powerful and effective body wash for men. For a clean face and body, squeeze Dove Men+Care Body and Face Wash into the palm of your hand. Work it into a light foam lather between your hands and massage onto face and body before rinsing thoroughly. Dove Men+Care celebrates a new definition of strength: one with care at its center. We believe that care makes a man stronger. Real strength is shown through the care you give to the people who matter to you - and that includes you. That's why we specially designed Dove Men+Care products to protect and care for your skin.\n

name: Go Fresh Burst Body Wash
description: moisturizing coconut milk beauty bar will leave your skin soft and clean We created a range of skin cleansing and skin care products designed to leave you and your skin feeling refreshed. The secret to beautiful skin is moisture, and no other bar soap hydrates. We believe that cleansing should be an opportunity for you to take a few moments just for yourself. That‚Äôs why we created the pampering Dove Shea Butter Beauty Bar, an indulgent Dove Beauty Bar that has the warm, comforting scents of shea butter and vanilla. Formulated with Dove‚Äôs gentle cleansers and 1/4 moisturizing cream, the Shea Butter Beauty Bar leaves skin feeling soft and smooth and looking radiant. A gentle cleanser that cares for your skin as you cleanse, Dove Beauty Bar helps deliver nourishment and leave your face and body feeling soft and smooth and looking more radiant than an ordinary bar soap does. Use your Beauty Bar as a facial cleanser or as a gentle skin cleanser for your body and hands. For best results, rub your Dove Shea Butter Beauty Bar between wet hands and massage the smooth, creamy lather over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. With beautiful blends of skin-loving ingredients, Dove cleansing skin care products create a rich lather with soothing scents that create a relaxing experience that will leave both you and your skin feeling balanced, renewed, and nourished. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential.
brand_description: Dove is¬†a personal care brand owned by the London-Rotterdam consumer goods company Unilever. The products are sold in more than 150 countries and are offered for both women, men, babies and kids. Dove's logo is a silhouette profile of the brand's namesake bird.

Use your Beauty Bar as a facial cleanser or as a gentle skin cleanser for your body and hands. For best results, rub between wet hands and massage the smooth, creamy lather over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. name: Maybelline Baby Lips Cherry Me
description:
The Baby Lips in Cherry Me by Maybelline is a super moisturising lip balm created to give you a perfect pout thats hydrated for up to  hours With SPF protection and a subtle colour to complement any skin tone this lip balm comes in a convenient twist cover
                                  Boasting an exclusive renew formula Baby Lips works to protect the lips whilst keeping them supple and soft The ultimate addition to your handbag its a must have KD
                                  Directions of use
                                  
                                  Apply your lipcolour by starting in the centre of your upper lip
                                  Work from the centre to the outer edges of your lip following the contours of your mouth
                                  Then glide across the entire bottom lip
reviews[0].review: This is the perfect lip balm.Great colour tint. Nice smell. Easy to apply and keeps my lips soft all year round.Highly recommend
reviews[1].review: Love this lip balm all year round.Keeps lips soft and moisturised. The hint of colour saves having to wear lipstick!Highly recommend
reviews[2].review: Love this lip tinted lip balm have been using for years. Moisturises and gives a natural colour finish.
reviews[3].review: This has been my favourite lip balm for 10 years and would be my one desert island pick! Smells amazing and I love the sheer subtle colour
reviews[4].review: This lip balm is my ultimate beauty day time staple. Hydrates my chapped lips and gives a lovely red pop of colour! Hard to get nowadays love it!
reviews[5].review: Feels nice on my lips and gives a hint of colour
reviews[6].review: Love the scent and nice subtle tint on the lips
reviews[7].review: Great light lip balm leaves lips hydrated smells great and just a slight tint of colour.
reviews[8].review: I love this tinted lipbalm. I have about 5 on the go in various bags and drawers so that I can always quickly find one! Its really moisturising and gives a lovely colour. Ive tried lots of others but always return to this.
reviews[9].review: Has just a hint of colour to brighten up your lips any time of the day! I usually use it on make-up free days and it works wonders to still make you feel ready to take on the day. I take this everywhere with me! It goes on so smoothly and feels really moisturising on the lips. I do wish it had a bit more staying power and lasted longer but for the price point really can't complain!

name: Maybelline Brow Ultra Slim Eyebrow Pencil ml Various Shades
description: Add definition to your brows with the Maybelline Brow Ultra Slim Eyebrow Pencil Whether your aesthetic leans towards subtle fluffy brows or you like them to look big bold and in charge the eyebrow pencil will have you covered The creamy buildable formula allows the pencil to glide effortlessly across the skin and the hair never leaving a cakey crumbly residue behindThe ultraslim tip makes the creation of tiny naturallooking hairs quick and easy allowing you to unleash your creativity and sculpt your brows to the exact look that you desire The convenient spoolie means that taming unruly pesky stray hairs can be done in seconds meaning your brows can look neat and precise whenever you need them to Highlypractical the doubleended eyebrow pencil is perfect for popping into your bag for topups on the go allowing you to always have total control over your aesthetic

name: Maybelline Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick g Various Colours
description: Drench your lips in vivid color with a velvety matte finish Liquid matte lipstick designed with x the pigments for intense color
reviews[0].review: I absolutely love Maybelline's nude lipstick! It's the perfect shade of nude that complements my skin tone perfectly. The formula is creamy hydrating and applies smoothly. It doesn't dry out my lips like many other matte lipsticks I've tried in the past.nnWhat I love most about this lipstick is that it's long lasting. I can wear it all day and don't have to worry about reapplying it throughout the day. It stays put and doesn't smudge or bleed which is a major plus.nnThe packaging is also sleek and easy to use. The shape of the lipstick makes it easy to apply and the cap snaps on securely so I don't have to worry about it coming off in my purse.nnOverall Maybelline's nude lipstick is a must-have in my makeup collection. It's affordable high quality and perfect for everyday wear. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable and long-lasting nude lipstick.
reviews[1].review: This matte liquid lipstick blends well even on dry lips and provides good shade. Transfer proof n smudge proof .
reviews[2].review: Shade:11 Made easy.A long lasting transfer proof brown shade. Flawless application and gives rich look.
reviews[3].review: Maybelline introduces another remarkable lipstick which is matte transfer-proof and yet non-drying at a super-affordable price of Rs.349. It gives full opacity with one swipe drying down to a matte within seconds of applying. It is transfer-proof yet feels very comfortable almost weightless and doesnt dry out the lips. Unlike some matte liquid lipsticks this doesnt become crumbly or flake off in pieces even after wearing for many hours.nI apply it with a light hand as the colour deepens after drying. During the day when I dont want an intense look (with this shade) I dot a small amount on my lips and dab it all over for a toned down blotted look which I love. Wears for 6-7 hrs in this weather but requires application after a meal. Unlike the Superstay Matte Ink this is easily removed with plain micellar water and doesnt require a bi-phase one.nnThe biggest con for me is it emphasizes texture & lines on my lips hence the 4*.  This shade also gradually changes colour from a reddish-brown to a pinkish-reddish-brown (hard to describe but the brown tone lessens) after 4-5 hrs. Not sure if its only with this shade or it is because of the lipstick gradually adapting to my natural lip colour. Overall a really good product as its performance is on par with many high-end brands. A transfer-proof yet comfortable liquid lipstick is good for daily wear as well as for special events. This formula would be a comfortable way of wearing deep shades like red.
reviews[4].review: Super happy with this purchase. Not gonna lie its my fav matte brush lipstick and this shade 'made easy' looks gorgeous on dusky to medium skintone. So all the brown beauties go for it.

My husband works outdoors and hes noticed its helped soften and soothe his skin from the cold and wind. Hes even uses it on his face. My daughter is 8 and has Psoriasis. She is sensitive to products but this has soothed her skin and made it less angry - the pump has made it much easier for her to apply it herself as well! My son is 3 and gets very dry skin in the winter and it has worked wonders for him also. I love everything about this product and will genuinely purchase this myself in the future! reviews[1].review: Lovely and light and no grease residue left
reviews[2].review: This is fabulous. I suffer with really sore dry red skin on my hands this time of year. It was nice to find a hand cream that firstly didnt sting. It went on really lovely and smooth. Highly recommend. My hands are so much better.
reviews[3].review: For the price this hand cream is fab! My hands get really dry and I find this really helps.
reviews[4].review: I have dry hands and this hand cream was not too heavy and very nourishing and hydrating.n  Would deffo recommend n  #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[5].review: For a cream that doesnt have a rich and luxurious feel to it it worked wonders. Im constantly in water washing dishes and this definitely provided a barrier to the harsh drying out effect of vibrant washing.  Non greasy (which was great) easy to apply non scented and absorbed without leaving a residue. Great product! Fits easily into my handbag and more importantly my budget! #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[6].review: I first started buying Aveeno after my doctor recommended it for my children who suffer with infant eczema but now the whole house hold use it. Its made from oatmeal so it helps to moisturise and protect even the most sensitive skin. Its a really hydrating moisturiser that doesnt irritate sore or delicate skin. I love how this makes my hands feel smooth and soft instantly. It soaks in quickly and its not sticky. Its really hydrating so I dont feel I need to constantly re-apply. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[7].review: Definitely recommend this hand cream. In just two days my hands are much softer than normal. It's not sticky at all and you don't need to keep applying it throughout the day to keep your hands moisturised. Amazing stuff. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[8].review: I had Aveeno daily moisturising hand cream to try and was blown away with the results.  I have quite dry hands and have to moisturise several times a day usually. I found that I didn't need to use Aveeno as much. It is a creamy texture and a little goes a long way.  Just pop a dab on the back of your hand (my preferred way) or in your palm and rub into hands . It soaks in quickly and although a bit tacky initially doesn't last long. Definitely left my hands looking younger smooth and hydrated. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[9].review: I loved this handcream. It was very soothing and my normally very chapped and dry hands were smooth and soft after using. I found that they did not feel dry even with repeated washing. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample

name: Aveeno Daily Moisturising Lotion ml
description: Aveenos body lotion is carefully formulated to deliver essential nourishment to even the most sensitive skin types Deeply moisturising the lotion keeps skin feeling soft supple and more comfortable without aggravating existing irritationBlended with Prebiotic Colloidal Oatmeal the body cream harmonises with your skins natural microbiome ensuring that its entire surface is balanced and never stripped of essential goodness Youll be treated to a healthierlooking finish while moisture is locked in more effectively as the lotion works to fortify your barriers for better water retention Skin will be moisturised for up to  hours with regular use The lotion is unscented making it compatible with those who are sensitive to fragrancesSuitable for normal dry and sensitive skin types

reviews[1].review: I honestly love this such good value makes my skin so soft

reviews[3].review: Aveeno products are great. My son suffers with eczema and without having to use steroid cream to solve his skin he uses avenoo daily and it keeps the dry skin at bay

name: Aveeno Face Calm and Restore Gentle PHA Exfoliating Cleanser ml
description: Developed for sensitive skin types the Aveeno CALMRESTORE Gentle PHA Exfoliating Cleanser leave skin feeling smooth and hydrated The nonabrasive cleanser gently exfoliates the skin to minimise the look of dead skin cells and congestion while nourishing the skins moisture barrier\n\n        Gentle enough for daily use the exfoliant works to visibly refresh the complexion to reveal the look of smoother brighter skin Polyhydroxy acid powers the formula to slough away dead dull skin cells causing visible texture and a lack of radiance The formula does this without compromising the skins natural moisture barrier thanks to oat oil that nourishes the skin for a soft supple feeling

reviews[1].review: Leaves my skin feeling soft and had definitely helped with my facial redness

If you have rosacea this cleanser may work out very well for you as it doesn't cause any redness sensitivity or dry the skin out.
reviews[5].review: Soft and gentle on my sensitive sink. Love all their products.
reviews[6].review: Really lovely and gentle cleanser which will protect your skin barrier.
reviews[7].review: I have been using the Aveeno Face CALM+RESTORE cleanser for over 2 weeks now and found that it is very gentle to skin leaving it feeling delicate and smooth. I used it at night following the removal of makeup and found that it was the best consistency to do this as it is very smooth and doesn't foam being easy to apply to the skin. It didn't irritate my skin and I did not have any allergic reactions to its ingredients - it is hypoallergenic and doesn't have alcohol in it so is gentle to more reaction-prone skin. At this point I haven't seen any changes - negative or positive - that would encourage me to buy another once this one is empty but this could change after longer use. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[8].review: I had high expectations from this product and this cleanser has a creamy consistency and is supposed to clean and moisturise the skin. I cannot say that its the best cleanser I have ever used. It does not clean the makeupn  well and doesnt moisturise the skin as expected. It might be worth considering as a second cleaner when you apply after cleaning your makeup first.n  #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[9].review: I found this face wash extremely gentle. It does not foam which isnt a problem as usually what makes them foam is skin drying. It doesnt have much of a scent. After washing my face with it I feel like my skin isnt properly cleaned hence I only using it in the morning. My daughter on the other hand likes it a lot. She doesnt wear make up and finds that it cleans her skin sufficiently. I have sensitive skin and this product does not dry it out or irritates it. It wont do you any harm but at the same time it wont transform your skin either. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample

name: Aveeno Face Calm and Restore Oat Rich Balm ml
description:
Targeting multiple signs of dry skin including tightness uneven texture and sensitivity the Aveeno Face CALMRESTORE Oat Rich Balm delivers up to  hours of soothing hydration

        Powered by a blend of ceramides and Aveenos Triple Oat Complex the creamy formula provides a lasting boost of moisture while simultaneously nourishing the skin barrier Its smoothing properties leaves the complexion with a more clarified uniform appearance

        Dermatologist tested
reviews[0].review: I love this cream. Not greasy goes on well and my skin feels soft for hours. Definitely recommend.
reviews[1].review: so many balms bring me out in spots. even though i have dry skin not acne prone skin. it just doesn't like being over occluded. this is so nice provides a protective layer which does the same job as other thicker creams balms i've tried. but sinks in and doesn't just transfer to your pillow. also the only thick cream i would consider for day time use. i like the ingredient list too.
reviews[2].review: I've always suffered with sensitive & eczema prone skin since birth (now 40). Sadly at start of this year I had anaphylaxis following some antibiotics which did not agree with me. My skin went nuts with this & nothing worked - until this range!! I have now been using every morning & evening - touch wood my skin is AMAZING!!!! Have now restocked ready for when I run out. Highly recommend.
reviews[3].review: Love this moisturiser! It feels rich on the skin but its actually quite lightweight and sinks into skin quickly. Helps with dry patches and good for sensitive skin!
reviews[4].review: I was surprised how good and hydrating this balm was. For dry skin I would say the balm is the best moisturiser as the gel one sinks in too quick for me. Cant complain at this price point
reviews[5].review: I really wanted to love this product and thought the texture would be what it says on the product: a balm. Unfortunately its more like porridge (which I guess makes sense since its oats lol) and its so hard to rub onto your skin. It doesnt blend easily into your skin and it splits and pills even after I let my previous layer completely dry out.nn  I do wake up with really nice moisturised skin the next day but the experience of applying it does put me off from using it.
reviews[6].review: I had incredibly dry skin on my face! I tried other productsbut this has worked wonders
reviews[7].review: This product was very luxurious. The packaging is lovely and durable.n  The cream was thick and absorbed well on the skin. It is perfect for winter months especially for very dry skin. I found that it was perfect for overnight treatment. Left my skin silky soft and well hydrated. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[8].review: I have been using Avveno Calm +Restore face moisturiser for around 2 weeks now & have seen a big difference in my skin already. This face cream is extremely moisturising without feeling greasy or oily. My dry flaky patches of skin have disappeared and redness across my tzone greatly reduced. I have been using this on an evening before bed and my face still feels smooth and hydrated by morning! I will definitely be continuing to use this all throughout winter. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[9].review: I can say that I am very happy with Aveeno Face Calm+Restore Oat Rich Balm .I use it once a day.I like it because it doesn't have scent and it moisture my face skin very well.I recommend it  #HomeTesterClubFreeSample

reviews[0].review: Love the price tag on this for what it does

reviews[3].review: This is my second purchase of this product! Love the smell and the spray bottle is easy to use to get even coverage over body
reviews[4].review: Used out of the shower for first time today. Took about 15 mins to fully soak in. Loved it. Skin so soft.
reviews[5].review: Highly recommend! One of the best things Ive brought recently! Leave my skin and my childrens skin smooth and feeling hydrated. Plus smells good too!
reviews[6].review: I suffer with really dry skin and love the Aveeno range but had not tried this product. I wasnt disappointed. It has left my skin feeling super smooth and beautifully moisturised. Highly recommend.
reviews[7].review: First time using Aveeno body oil Im very impressed smells amazing leaves my skin so soft I use it daily definitely buying again for suren  A great price too bargain
reviews[8].review: Amazing oil!n  I normally used Elizabeth Arden body oil this is the next best thing.n  Incredible smells delicious.

name: Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Hand Cream ml
description: Nourish your palms with the Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Hand Cream Powered by a unique Prebiotic Triple Oat Complex this lotion soothes very dry hands delivering essential moisture Lightweight yet rich the cream is easily absorbed transforming the skins texture from dry and rough to smooth and silky Working to restore the skins natural barriers the blend strengthens the moisture seal locking in hydration for a longlasting effectInfused with Shea Butter the formula is rich in vitamins and essential fatty acids smoothing the surface for an improved texture Also giving the lotion antiinflammatory power Shea Butter soothes irritation and calms redness healing the skins surface Dermatologist tested this delicate moisturiser is suitable for sensitive skin specially formulated to minimise the risk of allergiesDermatologisttested Suitable for sensitive skin
reviews[0].review: Its not sticky at all feels so nice to put on.
reviews[1].review: This hand cream has been wonderful on my dry and sensitive hands. After suffering with eczema on my hands this hand cream is soothing and hydrates the skin
reviews[2].review: This hand cream is the best I have ever used. In my work I constantly wash my hands and this hand cream 100% stops my hands drying out.
reviews[3].review: Aveeno moisturising hand cream is good as i had very dry skin and it helped to stop the skin from cracking.
reviews[4].review: Best moisturiser this is so good for dry hands doesnt leave an oily residue at all. Is great for daily use for dry hands during winter.
reviews[5].review: My daughter has very dry hands and shes tried every cream there is without success. She started using this cream a couple of months ago and has found that it is the only one that really helps keep her hands smooth and pain free.
reviews[6].review: This is a must for winter dry chapped hands! Good sized tube and very affordable. Absorbs quickly with no sticky feeling

reviews[8].review: Used this a few times now as needed and skin feels soft afterwards

name: Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion ml
description: Ideal for using on skin thats extremely dry and easily irritated Aveenos body lotion offers relief wherever its applied With a carefully blended moisturising formula skin will feel conditioned for a softer smoother finish thats more comfortable than before Containing a Prebiotic Triple Oat Complex the lotion harnesses the powers of Oat Flour Oat Extract and Oat Oil to balance your natural microbiome for a soothed end result This is combined with sumptuous Shea Butter which works to lock in essential moisture and deeply nourish even the driest of areas Skin will feel moisturised for up to  hours when used regularly for longlasting comfort and softness
reviews[0].review: This is a nice moisturiser it's not the fastest absorbing but it's not bad and does smell and feel nice. I use after using the rest of the Aveeno range and it's very gentle
reviews[1].review: I've been ordering this cream for many years now as it's the best for my dry sensitive and eczema prone skin. Moisturisers for the whole day and does not trigger my eczema rather calms it. Highly recommend!
reviews[2].review: I was recommended this by my doctor as I have really bad eczema thats caused by the cold and dry skin and this has helped so much
reviews[3].review: I guess just an ordinary cream I personally don't like the smell
reviews[4].review: This is a really delicious cream for regular use on dry skin especially in the cold winter months! It feels rich but not greasy and sinks in very fast.n  It's especially good after shaving and completely eliminates any itchiness.n  There's no fragrance and I really like this because fragrances can be irritating and also clash with perfume etc.n  Overall a superb product that I use all the time.
reviews[5].review: I am really pleased at how long lasting and effective this lotion is. I apply after a shower in the morning all over my body and it lasts the whole day even over night. It absorbs nicely and leaves my skin feeling soft smooth and hydrated. It also gives it a radiant healthy look which is great. I have patches of dry skin and my skin is sensitive but this lotion is soothing and has improved it so much.
reviews[6].review: My skin clearly just does not produce enough of whatever it needs to stop it being flaky and intolerable. I've tried so many body lotions over the years that have not worked in any capacity for my skin even really popular dermalogically tested moisturisers. It doesn't help that I can't use anything on my body that has strong scent or alcohol in it without irritating rashing me up. But this aveeno moisturisers? Literally could not live without it. Nothing has combated my chronically dry hands and flaky shoulders arms like this body lotion. I stock up on it whenever I can so I don't run out. I don't know what I'd do without this in the winter.
reviews[7].review: This is a lovely product to use - not greasy but packs the full moisturising punch whilst been super easy and fast for my skin to absorb. I moisturise twice a day and have found my new go to product!
reviews[8].review: The perfect body lotion for this time of year! Repurchase consistently.
reviews[9].review: This body moisturiser is amazingly rich and luxurious. A small amount goes a long way and it locks in the moisture after a shower.n  I was experiencing some dry skin on my legs and this alleviated it within a few days and was really gentle . I would highly recommend this product and I will be continuing to use it as part of my skin care routine

reviews[0].review: I love this cream it works to help get rid of bumpy skin and hydrates the skin too I e Been using this for a while now
reviews[1].review: This cream is quite thick in consistency but it easy to apply and leaves skin feeling moisturised
reviews[2].review: Ive only tried it once but it is not very thick and not sticky which is good. Hopefully it will help some bumps on my thighs
reviews[3].review: This body cream balm is amazing! It is a little on the thick side but it absorbs into the skin effortlessly and leaves it so smooth and soothed. I have gone through 3 pots of this now and it's transforming my skin. My skin has never felt softer and I love it's gently enough to use on a daily basis. Aveeno have really done a fantastic job with this product. The lotion version is also very nice.
reviews[4].review: This is a very thick product it is unscented which I love. I love that it has gentle exfoliating properties.
reviews[5].review: A little of this super thick moisturiser goes a long way this tub will last a very long time! I was anticipating it to feel sticky after application given how thick it was but found it to absorb quite quickly.  It definitely left my skin deeply moisturised between bathing but found the scent a little off putting (it states fragrance free but has a slight chemical smell to it) a good moisturiser if you have sensitive skin. #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[6].review: Packaging is nice and sleek; simple natural palette which reflects well on the product. Easy to open and sealed with foil.nn  The scent is not overwhelming or offensive; quite natural.nn  Although it has a medium to thick consistency the cream is easily to apply and absorbs well. You don't need to wait a long time before getting dressed.nn  I used it straight after the shower in the evenings so it could work overnight. After using it every day for a week I did see a bit of a difference. My skin is a little smoother and my keratosis pilaris is a bit calmer. nn  Jury's still out but I will continue to use it and see how it goes.
reviews[7].review: I have keratosis pilaris on my arms and tights. I can see it's already reduced after using this cream. My skin feels smoother and more hydrated. I wish the cream would absorb quicker.  #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[8].review: I really enjoyed using this. Meant to help rough skin and whilst I cant say it has made a difference just yet it does have a lovely thick texture that is great for parched skin. Will continue to try and see if it helps #HomeTesterClubFreeSample
reviews[9].review: I loved the fact this was very thick & creamy as it gave it a very luxurious feel and instantly hydrated the skin. Although i wasn't overly keen on the oily residue that it left after application.n  Overall this was a lovely product and very generous filling of the tub too! #HomeTesterClubFreeSample

reviews[0].review: I purchased this soothing bath soak for my mum who is dealing with shingles. While the shingles pain is tough this soak has been a welcome relief. reviews[3].review: Eczema friendly for sure. Better than other alternatives. Follow the instructions carefully and you will be happy with the product.
reviews[4].review: Tried 3 sachets every time I've changed my approach slightly to prevent clumks but everytime I end up with clumps which is kind of annoying.
